5.verse: Mayiko akumwamba amatamanda zozizwitsa zanu Yehova, kukhulupirika kwanunso, mu msonkhano wa oyera mtima anu.

6.verse: Pakuti ndani mu mlengalenga angalingane ndi Yehova? Ndani wofanana ndi Yehova pakati pa zolengedwa zakumwamba?

7.verse: Mu msonkhano wa oyera mtima Mulungu amaopedwa kwambiri; Iye ndiye wochititsa mantha kupambana onse amene amuzungulira.

8.verse: Inu Yehova Mulungu Wamphamvuzonse, ndani wofanana nanu? Yehova ndinu wamphamvu ndipo kukhulupirika kwanu kwakuzungulirani.

9.verse: Mumalamula nyanja ya mafunde awukali; pamene mafunde ake awundana Inu mumawakhalitsa bata.

10.verse: Munaphwanya Rahabe monga munthu wophedwa; ndi dzanja lanu lamphamvu munabalalitsa adani anu.

11.verse: Mayiko akumwamba ndi anu ndiponso dziko lapansi ndi lanu; munapanga dziko lonse ndi zonse zili mʼmenemo.

12.verse: Munalenga Kumpoto ndi Kummwera; Tabori ndi Herimoni akuyimba ndi chimwemwe pa dzina lanu.

13.verse: Mkono wanu ndi wamphamvu; dzanja lanu ndi lamphamvu, dzanja lanu lamanja ndi lopambana.

14.verse: Chilungamo ndi chiweruzo cholungama ndiye maziko a mpando wanu waufumu; chikondi ndi kukhulupirika zimayenda patsogolo panu.

15.verse: Ndi odala amene aphunzira kuyamika Inu, amene amayenda mʼkuwunika kwa nkhope yanu Yehova.

16.verse: Amakondwera mʼdzina lanu tsiku lonse lathunthu; amasangalala koposa mʼchilungamo chanu.

17.verse: Pakuti Inu ndiye ulemerero wawo ndi mphamvu yawo ndipo mwa kukoma mtima kwanu Inu mumakweza nyanga yathu.

18.verse: Ndithudi, chishango chathu ndi cha Yehova, Mfumu yathu kwa Woyerayo wa Israeli.

19.verse: Kale munayankhula mʼmasomphenya, kwa anthu anu okhulupirika munati, “Ndapatsa mphamvu wankhondo; ndakweza mnyamata wochokera pakati pa anthu.

20.verse: Ndamupeza mtumiki wanga Davide; ndamudzoza ndi mafuta opatulika.

21.verse: Dzanja langa lidzamuchirikiza; zoonadi, mkono wanga udzamupatsa mphamvu.

22.verse: Adani sadzamulamula kuti apereke msonkho; anthu oyipa sadzamusautsa.

23.verse: Ndidzaphwanya adani ake pamaso pake ndi kukantha otsutsana naye.

24.verse: Chikondi changa chokhulupirika chidzakhala naye, ndipo kudzera mʼdzina langa nyanga yake idzakwezedwa.

25.verse: Ndidzayika dzanja lake pa nyanja, dzanja lake lamanja pa mitsinje.

26.verse: Iyeyo adzafuwula kwa Ine kuti, ‘Ndinu Atate anga, Mulungu wanga, Thanthwe ndi Chipulumutso changa.’

27.verse: Ndidzamuyika kuti akhale mwana wanga woyamba kubadwa; wokwezedwa kwambiri pakati pa mafumu a dziko lapansi.

28.verse: Ndidzamusungira chifundo changa kwamuyaya, ndipo pangano langa ndi iye silidzatha.

29.verse: Ine ndidzakhazikitsa zidzukulu zake mpaka muyaya, mpando wake waufumu ngati masiku a miyamba.

30.verse: “Ngati ana ake adzataya lamulo langa ndi kusatsatira malangizo anga,

31.verse: ngati adzaswa malamulo anga ndi kulephera kusunga ziphunzitso zanga,

32.verse: Ine ndidzalanga tchimo lawo ndi ndodo, mphulupulu zawo powakwapula.

33.verse: Koma sindidzachotsa chikondi changa pa iye, kapena kukhala wosakhulupirika kwa iyeyo.

34.verse: Sindidzaswa pangano langa kapena kusintha zimene milomo yanga yayankhula.

35.verse: Ndinalumbira kamodzi mwa kuyera kwanga ndipo sindidzanama kwa Davide,

36.verse: kuti zidzukulu zake zidzakhale kwamuyaya ndipo mpando wake waufumu udzakhazikika pamaso panga ngati dzuwa;

37.verse: udzakhazikika kwamuyaya monga mwezi, mboni yokhulupirika mʼmitambo. Sela

38.verse: “Koma tsopano Inu mwamukana, mwamutaya, mwamukwiyira kwambiri wodzozedwa wanu.

39.verse: Mwakana pangano ndi mtumiki wanu ndipo mwadetsa mʼfumbi chipewa chake chaufumu.

40.verse: Inu mwagumula makoma ake onse ndipo mwasandutsa bwinja malinga ake.

41.verse: Onse amene amadutsa amalanda zinthu zake; iye wakhala chotonzedwa cha anansi ake.

42.verse: Mwakweza dzanja lamanja la adani ake; mwachititsa kuti adani ake akondwere.

43.verse: Mwabunthitsa lupanga lake, simunamuthandize pa nkhondo.

44.verse: Inu mwathetsa kukongola kwa ulemerero wake ndipo mwagwetsa pansi mpando wake waufumu.

45.verse: Mwachepetsa masiku a unyamata wake; mwamuphimba ndi chofunda chochititsa manyazi. Sela

46.verse: “Mpaka liti Yehova? Kodi mudzadzibisa mpaka kalekale? Mpaka liti ukali wanu udzayaka ngati moto?

47.verse: Kumbukirani kuti masiku a moyo wanga ndi ochepa pakuti munalenga kwachabe anthu onse!

48.verse: Kodi ndi munthu uti angakhale ndi moyo ndi kusaona imfa? Kapena kudzipulumutsa yekha ku mphamvu ya manda? Sela

49.verse: Inu Ambuye kodi chili kuti chikondi chanu chachikulu choyamba chija, chimene mwa kukhulupirika kwanu munalumbira kwa Davide?

50.verse: Kumbukirani, Ambuye momwe mtumiki wanu wanyozedwera, momwe ndakhalira ndi kusunga mu mtima mwanga mawu a pangano a anthu a mitundu yonse,

51.verse: mawu achipongwe amene adani anu akhala akunyoza, Inu Yehova, ndi mawu amene akhala akunyoza mayendedwe onse a wodzozedwa wanu.

52.verse: “Matamando akhale kwa Yehova mpaka muyaya!” Ameni ndi Ameni.

1.verse: BUKU LACHINAYI - Masalimo 90–106Pemphero la Mose munthu wa Mulungu. Ambuye, mwakhala muli malo athu okhalamo pa mibado yonse.

2.verse: Mapiri asanabadwe, musanalenge nʼkomwe dziko lapansi ndi dziko lonse, kuyambira muyaya mpaka muyaya Inu ndinu Mulungu.

3.verse: Inu mumabwezera anthu ku fumbi, mumati, “Bwerera ku fumbi iwe mwana wa munthu.”

4.verse: Pakuti zaka 1,000 pamaso panu zili ngati tsiku limene lapita kapena ngati kamphindi ka usiku.

5.verse: Inu mumasesa anthu mʼtulo ta imfa, iwo ali ngati udzu watsopano wa mmawa,

6.verse: ngakhale kuti mmawa umaphuka watsopano, pofika madzulo wauma ndi kufota.

7.verse: Ife tathedwa ndi mkwiyo wanu; ndipo taopsezedwa ndi kuyipidwa kwanu.

8.verse: Mwayika mphulupulu zathu pamaso panu, machimo athu obisika poonekera pamaso panu.

9.verse: Masiku athu onse amatha ali pansi pa ukali wanu; timatsiriza zaka zathu ndi kubuwula.

10.verse: Kuchuluka kwa masiku athu ndi 70, kapena 80 ngati tili ndi mphamvu; komabe zaka zonsezi ndi za mavuto ndi nkhawa, zimatha mofulumira ndipo ife timawulukira kutali.

11.verse: Kodi ndani amadziwa mphamvu ya mkwiyo wanu? Pakuti ukali wanu ndi waukulu ngati ulemu umene uyenera Inu.

12.verse: Tiphunzitseni kuwerenga masiku athu molondola, kuti tikhale ndi mtima wanzeru.

13.verse: Lezani mtima Inu Yehova! Kodi mudzatikwiyira mpaka liti? Achitireni chifundo atumiki anu.

14.verse: Mutikhutitse mmawa ndi chikondi chanu chosatha, kuti tiyimbe ndi chimwemwe ndi kukhala okondwa masiku athu onse.

15.verse: Tisangalatseni masiku ambiri monga masiku amene mwatisautsa, kwa zaka zambiri monga momwe tinaonera mavuto.

16.verse: Ntchito zanu zionetsedwe kwa atumiki anu, kukongola kwanu kwa ana awo.

17.verse: Kukoma mtima kwa Ambuye Mulungu wathu kukhale pa ife; tikhazikitsireni ntchito ya manja athu; inde, khazikitsani ntchito ya manja athu.

1.verse: Iye amene amakhala mu mthunzi wa Wammwambamwamba adzapuma mu mthunzi wa Wamphamvuzonse.

2.verse: Ndidzanena za Yehova, “Iye ndiye pothawira panga ndi linga langa, Mulungu wanga amene ndimadalira.”

3.verse: Ndithu, Iye adzakupulumutsa ku msampha wa mlenje ndi ku mliri woopsa;

4.verse: Adzakuphimba ndi nthenga zake, ndipo udzapeza malo othawira mʼmapikomo; kukhulupirika kwake kudzakhala chishango chako ndi lihawo.

5.verse: Sudzachita mantha ndi zoopsa za usiku, kapena muvi wowuluka masana,

6.verse: kapena mliri umene umayenda mu mdima, kapena zowononga za pa nthawi ya masana.

7.verse: Anthu 1,000 atha kufa pambali pako, anthu 10,000 kudzanja lako lamanja, koma zoopsazo sizidzafika pafupi ndi iwe.

8.verse: Udzapenya ndi maso ako ndipo udzaona mmene anthu oyipa amalangidwira.

9.verse: Pakuti wasankha Wammwambamwamba kukhala malo ako okhalamo; wavomera Yehova kukhala kothawira kwako.

10.verse: Choncho palibe choyipa chimene chidzakugwera, zoopsa sizidzafika pafupi ndi tenti yako.

11.verse: Pakuti adzalamulira angelo ake za iwe, kuti akutchinjirize mosamala pa njira zako zonse;

12.verse: ndipo adzakunyamula ndi manja awo, kuti phazi lako lisagunde pa mwala.

13.verse: Udzapondaponda mkango ndi njoka, udzapondereza mkango wamphamvu ndiponso chinjoka.

14.verse: “Chifukwa iye amandikonda,” akutero Yehova, “Ndidzamulanditsa; ndidzamuteteza pakuti wavomereza dzina langa.

15.verse: Adzandiyitana, ndipo ndidzamuyankha; ndidzakhala naye pa mavuto, ndidzamupulumutsa ndi kumulemekeza.

16.verse: Ndidzamupatsa moyo wautali ndi kumupulumutsa.”

1.verse: Salimo. Nyimbo ya pa tsiku la Sabata. Nʼkwabwino kutamanda Yehova ndi kuyimbira nyimbo dzina lanu, Inu Wammwambamwamba,

2.verse: Kulengeza chikondi chanu mmawa, ndi kukhulupirika kwanu nthawi ya usiku,

3.verse: kuyimbira nyimbo choyimbira cha zingwe khumi ndi mayimbidwe abwino a zeze.

4.verse: Pakuti Inu mumandisangalatsa ndi ntchito zanu, Inu Yehova; Ine ndikuyimba mwachimwemwe pa ntchito ya manja anu.

5.verse: Ndi yayikuludi ntchito yanu Yehova, maganizo anu ndi ozamadi!

6.verse: Munthu wopanda nzeru sadziwa, zitsiru sizizindikira,

7.verse: kuti ngakhale anthu oyipa aphuka ngati udzu ndipo anthu onse ochita zoyipa apindula, adzawonongedwa kwamuyaya.

8.verse: Koma Inu Yehova, ndinu wokwezedwa kwamuyaya.

9.verse: Zoonadi adani anu Yehova, zoonadi adani anu adzawonongeka; onse ochita zoyipa adzabalalitsidwa.

10.verse: Inu mwakweza nyanga yanga ngati nyanga ya njati; mafuta abwino akhuthulidwa pamutu wanga.

11.verse: Maso anga aona kugonjetsedwa kwa olimbana nane, makutu anga amva za kugwa kwa amaliwongo anga oyipa.

12.verse: Anthu olungama adzaphuka ngati mtengo wa mgwalangwa, adzakula ngati mkungudza wa ku Lebanoni;

13.verse: odzalidwa mʼnyumba ya Yehova, adzakula bwino mʼmabwalo a Mulungu wathu.

14.verse: Iwo adzaberekabe zipatso mu ukalamba wawo, adzakhala anthete ndi obiriwira,

15.verse: kulengeza kuti, “Yehova ndi wolungama; Iye ndiye Thanthwe langa, ndipo mwa Iye mulibe choyipa.”

1.verse: Yehova akulamulira, wavala ulemerero; Yehova wavala ulemerero ndipo wadzimangirira mphamvu, dziko lonse lakhazikika kolimba; silingasunthidwe.

2.verse: Mpando wanu waufumu unakhazikika kalekale; Inu ndinu wamuyaya.

3.verse: Nyanja zakweza Inu Yehova, nyanja zakweza mawu ake; nyanja zakweza mafunde ake ochita mkokomo.

4.verse: Yehova ndi wamphamvu kupambana mkokomo wa madzi ambiri, ndi wamphamvu kupambana mafunde a nyanja, Yehova mmwamba ndi wamphamvu.

5.verse: Malamulo anu Yehova ndi osasinthika; chiyero chimakongoletsa nyumba yanu mpaka muyaya.

1.verse: Inu Yehova, ndinu Mulungu wobwezera chilango, Inu Mulungu amene mumabwezera chilango, wonetsani kuwala kwanu.

2.verse: Nyamukani, Inu woweruza wa dziko lapansi; bwezerani kwa odzikuza zowayenera.

3.verse: Kodi mpaka liti anthu oyipa Inu Yehova, mpaka liti anthu oyipa adzalumpha ndi chimwemwe?

4.verse: Amakhuthula mawu onyada; onse ochita zoyipa ndi odzaza ndi kudzikuza.

5.verse: Amaphwanya anthu anu, Inu Yehova; amapondereza cholowa chanu.

6.verse: Amaphanso amayi a masiye ndi alendo okhala nawo mʼdziko; amapha ana amasiye.

7.verse: Iwo amati, “Yehova sakuona; Mulungu wa Yakobo salabadirako.”

8.verse: Samalani, inu anthu opanda nzeru pakati pa anthu; zitsiru inu, kodi mudzakhala liti anzeru?

9.verse: Kodi Iye amene anapanga khutu sangathe kumva? Kodi Iye amene anapanga diso sangathe kuona?

10.verse: Kodi Iye amene amalangiza mitundu ya anthu sangathenso kulanga? Kodi Iye amene amaphunzitsa munthu angasowe nzeru?

11.verse: Yehova amadziwa maganizo a munthu; Iye amadziwa kuti maganizowo ndi achabechabe.

12.verse: Wodala munthu amene Inu Yehova mumamulangiza, munthu amene mumamuphunzitsa kuchokera mulamulo lanu;

13.verse: mumamupumitsa pa nthawi ya mavuto, mpaka woyipa atakumbiridwa dzenje.

14.verse: Pakuti Yehova sadzawakana anthu ake; Iye sadzasiya cholowa chake.

15.verse: Chiweruzo chidzakhazikikanso pa chilungamo, ndipo onse olungama mtima adzachitsata.

16.verse: Ndani adzadzuka chifukwa cha ine kulimbana ndi anthu oyipa? Ndani adzayimirira mʼmalo mwanga kulimbana ndi anthu ochita zoyipa?

17.verse: Yehova akanapanda kundithandiza, bwenzi nditakakhala msanga ku malo achete a imfa.

18.verse: Ndikanena kuti, “Phazi langa likuterereka,” chikondi chanu, Inu Yehova, chimandichirikiza.

19.verse: Pamene nkhawa inakula mʼkati mwanga, chitonthozo chanu chinabweretsa chimwemwe mʼmoyo mwanga.

20.verse: Kodi mpando waufumu woyipa ungathe kugwirizana nanu umene umabweretsa masautso chifukwa cha malamulo ake?

21.verse: Iwo amasonkhana pamodzi kulimbana ndi wolungama ndi kugamula kuti wosalakwa aphedwe.

22.verse: Koma Yehova wakhala linga langa, ndipo Mulungu ndiye thanthwe limene ndimathawirako.

23.verse: Iye adzawabwezera chifukwa cha machimo awo ndi kuwawononga chifukwa cha kuyipa kwawo; Yehova Mulungu wathu adzawawononga.

1.verse: Bwerani, tiyeni timuyimbire Yehova mwachimwemwe, tiyeni tifuwule kwa Thanthwe la chipulumutso chathu

2.verse: Tiyeni tibwere pamaso pake ndi chiyamiko ndipo mupembedzeni Iyeyo ndi zida zoyimbira ndi nyimbo.

3.verse: Pakuti Yehova ndi Mulungu wamkulu, mfumu yayikulu pamwamba pa milungu yonse.

4.verse: Mʼmanja mwake muli maziko ozama a dziko lapansi, ndipo msonga za mapiri ndi zake.

5.verse: Nyanja ndi yake, pakuti anayilenga ndi Iye, ndipo manja ake anawumba mtunda wowuma.

6.verse: Bwerani, tiyeni tiwerame pomulambira, tiyeni tigwade pamaso pa Yehova Mlengi wathu;

7.verse: pakuti Iye ndiye Mulungu wathu ndipo ife ndife anthu a pabusa pake, ndi nkhosa za mʼdzanja lake. Lero ngati inu mumva mawu ake,

8.verse: musawumitse mitima yanu monga momwe munachitira pa Meriba, monga munachitira tsiku lija pa Masa mʼchipululu.

9.verse: Kumene makolo anu anandiyesa ndi kundiputa, ngakhale anaona zimene Ine ndinazichita.

10.verse: Kwa zaka makumi anayi ndinali wokwiya ndi mʼbado umenewo; ndipo ndinati, “Iwo ndi anthu amene mitima yawo imasochera ndipo sanadziwe njira zanga.”

11.verse: Choncho ndili chikwiyire, ndinalumbira kuti, “Iwowa sadzalowa ku malo anga a mpumulo.”

1.verse: Imbirani Yehova nyimbo yatsopano; Imbirani Yehova dziko lonse lapansi.

2.verse: Imbirani Yehova, tamandani dzina lake; lalikirani chipulumutso chake tsiku ndi tsiku.

3.verse: Lengezani ulemerero wake pakati pa mayiko, ntchito zake zodabwitsa pakati pa mitundu yonse ya anthu.

4.verse: Pakuti wamkulu ndi Yehova ndipo ndi woyenera kwambiri kumutamanda; ayenera kuopedwa kupambana milungu yonse.

5.verse: Pakuti milungu yonse ya anthu a mitundu ina ndi mafano, koma Yehova analenga mayiko akumwamba.

6.verse: Ulemu ndi ufumu zili pamaso pake, mphamvu ndi ulemerero zili mʼmalo ake opatulika.

7.verse: Perekani kwa Yehova, inu mabanja a anthu a mitundu ina, perekani kwa Yehova ulemerero ndi mphamvu.

8.verse: Perekani kwa Yehova ulemerero woyenera dzina lake; bweretsani chopereka ndipo mulowe mʼmabwalo ake.

9.verse: Lambirani Yehova mu ulemerero wa chiyero chake; njenjemerani pamaso pake, dziko lonse lapansi.

10.verse: Nenani pakati pa mitundu ya anthu, “Yehova akulamulira.” Dziko lonse lakhazikika molimba, silingasunthidwe; Iye adzaweruza mitundu ya anthu molungama.

11.verse: Mayiko akumwamba asangalale, dziko lapansi likondwere; nyanja ikokome, ndi zonse zili mʼmenemo;

12.verse: minda ikondwere pamodzi ndi chilichonse chili mʼmenemo. Pamenepo mitengo yonse ya mʼnkhalango idzayimba ndi chimwemwe;

13.verse: idzayimba pamaso pa Yehova, pakuti Iye akubwera kudzaweruza dziko lapansi; adzaweruza dziko lonse mwachilungamo ndi mitundu ya anthu onse mʼchoonadi.

1.verse: Yehova akulamulira, dziko lapansi lisangalale; magombe akutali akondwere.

2.verse: Mitambo ndi mdima waukulu zamuzungulira; chilungamo ndi kuweruza molungama ndiwo maziko a mpando wake waufumu.

3.verse: Moto umapita patsogolo pake ndi kunyeketsa amaliwongo kumbali zonse.

4.verse: Zingʼaningʼani zake zimawalitsa dziko lonse; dziko lapansi limaona ndipo limanjenjemera.

5.verse: Mapiri amasungunuka ngati phula pamaso pa Yehova, pamaso pa Ambuye a dziko lonse lapansi.

6.verse: Mayiko akumwamba amalengeza za chilungamo chake, ndipo mitundu yonse ya anthu imaona ulemerero wake.

7.verse: Onse amene amalambira mafano osema amachititsidwa manyazi, iwo amene amanyadira mafano; mulambireni, inu milungu yonse!

8.verse: Ziyoni akumva ndipo akukondwera, midzi ya Yuda ikusangalala chifukwa cha maweruzo anu Yehova.

9.verse: Pakuti Inu Yehova ndi Wammwambamwamba pa dziko lonse lapansi; ndinu wokwezeka kupambana milungu yonse.

10.verse: Iwo amene amakonda Yehova adane ndi zoyipa pakuti Iye amayangʼanira miyoyo ya amene amamukhulupirira ndipo amawapulumutsa mʼdzanja la anthu oyipa

11.verse: Kuwala kumafika pa anthu olungama, ndi chimwemwe kwa olungama mtima.

12.verse: Kondwerani mwa Yehova Inu olungama ndipo tamandani dzina lake loyera.

1.verse: Salimo. Imbirani Yehova nyimbo yatsopano, pakuti Iyeyo wachita zinthu zodabwitsa; dzanja lake lamanja ndi mkono wake woyera zamuchitira chipulumutso.

2.verse: Yehova waonetsa chipulumutso chake ndipo waulula chilungamo chake kwa anthu a mitundu ina.

3.verse: Iye wakumbukira chikondi chake ndi kukhulupirika kwake pa Aisraeli; malekezero onse a dziko lapansi aona chipulumutso cha Mulungu wathu.

4.verse: Fuwulani mwachimwemwe kwa Yehova, dziko lonse lapansi, muyimbireni nyimbo mofuwula ndi mokondwera.

5.verse: Imbirani Yehova nyimbo ndi zeze, ndi zeze ndi mawu a kuyimba,

6.verse: ndi malipenga ndi kuliza kwa nyanga ya nkhosa yayimuna fuwulani mwachimwemwe pamaso pa Yehova Mfumu.

7.verse: Nyanja ikokome pamodzi ndi zonse zili mʼmenemo, dziko lonse ndi onse amene amakhala mʼmenemo.

8.verse: Mitsinje iwombe mʼmanja mwawo, mapiri ayimbe pamodzi mwachimwemwe;

9.verse: izo ziyimbe pamaso pa Yehova, pakuti Iye akubwera kudzaweruza dziko lapansi. Adzaweruza dziko lonse mwachilungamo, ndi mitundu ya anthu mosakondera.

1.verse: Yehova akulamulira, mitundu ya anthu injenjemere; Iye wakhala pa mpando wake waufumu, pakati pa akerubi, dziko lapansi ligwedezeke.

2.verse: Mʼziyoni wamkulu ndi Yehova; Iye ndi wokwezeka pamwamba pa mitundu yonse ya anthu.

3.verse: Anthu atamande dzina lanu lalikulu ndi loopsa kwambiri, Iye ndi woyera.

4.verse: Mfumu yamphamvu, iyo imakonda chilungamo Inu mwakhazikitsa khalidwe losakondera; mwachita zolungama ndi zoyenera mwa Yakobo.

5.verse: Kwezani Yehova Mulungu wathu ndipo mulambireni pa mapazi ake; Iye ndi woyera.

6.verse: Mose ndi Aaroni anali ena mwa ansembe ake, Samueli anali pamodzi ndi iwo amene anayitana pa dzina lake; iwo anayitana Yehova ndipo Iyeyo anawayankha.

7.verse: Iye anayankhula nawo kuchokera mʼchipilala cha mtambo; iwo anasunga malamulo ake ndi zophunzitsa zomwe anawapatsa.

8.verse: Inu Yehova Mulungu wathu, munawayankha iwo; Inu kwa Israeli munali Mulungu wokhululuka, ngakhale munawalanga pa zochita zawo zoyipa.

9.verse: Kwezani Yehova Mulungu wathu ndipo mumulambire pa phiri lake loyera, pakuti Yehova Mulungu wathu ndi woyera.

1.verse: Salimo. Nyimbo yothokoza. Fuwulani kwa Yehova mwachimwemwe, inu dziko lonse lapansi.

2.verse: Mulambireni Yehova mosangalala; bwerani pamaso pake ndi nyimbo zachikondwerero.

3.verse: Dziwani kuti Yehova ndi Mulungu. Iye ndiye amene anatipanga ndipo ife ndife ake; ndife anthu ake, nkhosa za pabusa pake.

4.verse: Lowani ku zipata zake ndi chiyamiko ndi ku mabwalo ake ndi matamando; muyamikeni ndi kutamanda dzina lake.

5.verse: Pakuti Yehova ndi wabwino ndipo chikondi chake ndi chamuyaya; kukhulupirika kwake nʼkokhazikika pa mibado ndi mibado.

1.verse: Salimo la Davide. Ndidzayimba za chikondi ndi chiweruzo chanu cholungama; kwa Inu Yehova ndidzayimba matamando.

2.verse: Ndidzatsata njira yolungama; nanga mudzabwera liti kwa ine? Ndidzayenda mʼnyumba mwanga ndi mtima wosalakwa.

3.verse: Sindidzayika chinthu chilichonse choyipa pamaso panga. Ine ndimadana ndi zochita za anthu opanda chikhulupiriro; iwo sadzadziphatika kwa ine.

4.verse: Anthu a mtima wokhota adzakhala kutali ndi ine; ine sindidzalola choyipa chilichonse kulowa mwa ine.

5.verse: Aliyense wosinjirira mnansi wake mseri ameneyo ndidzamuletsa; aliyense amene ali ndi maso amwano ndi mtima wodzikuza, ameneyo sindidzamulekerera.

6.verse: Maso anga adzakhala pa okhulupirika mʼdziko, kuti akhale pamodzi ndi ine; iye amene mayendedwe ake ndi wosalakwa adzanditumikira.

7.verse: Aliyense wochita chinyengo sadzakhala mʼnyumba mwanga. Aliyense woyankhula mwachinyengo sadzayima pamaso panga.

8.verse: Mmawa uliwonse ndidzatontholetsa anthu onse oyipa mʼdziko; ndidzachotsa aliyense wochita zoyipa mu mzinda wa Yehova.

1.verse: Pemphero la munthu wosautsidwa, pamene walefuka, nakhuthulira pamaso pa Yehova kulira kwakeko. Yehova imvani pemphero langa; kulira kwanga kopempha thandizo kufike kwa Inu.

2.verse: Musandibisire nkhope yanu pamene ndili pa msautso. Munditcherere khutu; pamene ndiyitana ndiyankheni msanga.

3.verse: Pakuti masiku anga akupita ngati utsi; mafupa anga akunyeka ngati nkhuni zoyaka.

4.verse: Mtima wanga wakanthidwa ndipo ukufota ngati udzu; ndipo ndimayiwala kudya chakudya changa.

5.verse: Chifukwa cha kubuwula kwanga kofuwula ndatsala chikopa ndi mafupa okhaokha.

6.verse: Ndili ngati kadzidzi wa ku chipululu, monga kadzidzi pakati pa mabwinja.

7.verse: Ndimagona osapeza tulo; ndakhala ngati mbalame yokhala yokha pa denga.

8.verse: Tsiku lonse adani anga amandichita chipongwe; iwo amene amandinyoza, amagwiritsa ntchito dzina langa ngati temberero.

9.verse: Pakuti ndimadya phulusa ngati chakudya changa ndi kusakaniza chakumwa changa ndi misozi

10.verse: chifukwa cha ukali wanu waukulu, popeza Inu mwandinyamula ndi kunditayira kumbali.

11.verse: Masiku anga ali ngati mthunzi wa kumadzulo; Ine ndikufota ngati udzu.

12.verse: Koma Inu Yehova, muli pa mpando wanu waufumu kwamuyaya; kudziwika kwanu ndi kokhazikika ku mibado yonse.

13.verse: Inu mudzadzuka ndi kuchitira chifundo Ziyoni pakuti ndi nthawi yoti muonetse kukoma mtima kwanu pa iyeyo; nthawi yoyikika yafika.

14.verse: Pakuti miyala yake ndi yokondedwa kwa atumiki anu; fumbi lake lokha limawachititsa kuti amve chisoni.

15.verse: Mitundu ya anthu idzaopa dzina la Yehova, mafumu onse a dziko lapansi adzalemekeza ulemerero wanu.

16.verse: Pakuti Yehova adzamanganso Ziyoni ndi kuonekera mu ulemerero wake.

17.verse: Iye adzayankha pemphero la anthu otayika; sadzanyoza kupempha kwawo.

18.verse: Zimenezi zilembedwe chifukwa cha mibado ya mʼtsogolo, kuti anthu amene sanabadwe adzatamande Yehova:

19.verse: “Yehova anayangʼana pansi kuchokera ku malo ake opatulika mmwamba, kuchokera kumwamba anayangʼana dziko lapansi,

20.verse: kuti amve kubuwula kwa anthu a mʼndende, kuti apulumutse amene anayenera kuphedwa.”

21.verse: Kotero dzina la Yehova lidzalengezedwa mu Ziyoni ndi matamando ake mu Yerusalemu,

22.verse: pamene mitundu ya anthu ndi maufumu adzasonkhana kuti alambire Yehova.

23.verse: Iye anathyola mphamvu zanga pa nthawi ya moyo wanga; Iyeyo anafupikitsa masiku anga.

24.verse: Choncho Ine ndinati: “Musandichotse, Inu Mulungu wanga, pakati pa masiku a moyo wanga; zaka zanu zimakhalabe pa mibado yonse.

25.verse: Pachiyambi Inu munakhazikitsa maziko a dziko lapansi ndipo mayiko akumwamba ndi ntchito ya manja anu.

26.verse: Izi zidzatha, koma Inu mudzakhalapo; zidzatha ngati chovala. Mudzazisintha ngati chovala ndipo zidzatayidwa.

27.verse: Koma Inu simusintha, ndipo zaka zanu sizidzatha.

28.verse: Ana a atumiki anu adzakhala pamaso panu; zidzukulu zawo zidzakhazikika pamaso panu.”

1.verse: Salimo la Davide. Tamanda Yehova, iwe moyo wanga; ndi zonse zamʼkati mwanga zitamande dzina lake loyera.

2.verse: Tamanda Yehova, iwe moyo wanga, ndipo usayiwale zabwino zake zonse.

3.verse: Amene amakhululuka machimo ako onse ndi kuchiritsa nthenda zako zonse,

4.verse: amene awombola moyo wako ku dzenje ndi kukuveka chikondi ndi chifundo chake ngati chipewa chaufumu,

5.verse: amene akwaniritsa zokhumba zako ndi zinthu zabwino, kotero kuti umakhala wamphamvu zatsopano ngati mphungu.

6.verse: Yehova amachita chilungamo ndipo amaweruza molungama onse opsinjika.

7.verse: Iye anadziwitsa Mose njira zake, ntchito zake kwa Aisraeli.

8.verse: Yehova ndi wachifundo ndi wokoma mtima, wosakwiya msanga ndi wachikondi chochuluka.

9.verse: Iye sadzatsutsa nthawi zonse, kapena kusunga mkwiyo wake kwamuyaya;

10.verse: satichitira molingana ndi machimo athu, kapena kutibwezera molingana ndi mphulupulu zathu.

11.verse: Pakuti monga kumwamba kuli kutali ndi dziko lapansi, koteronso chikondi chake nʼchachikulu kwa iwo amene amamuopa;

12.verse: monga kummawa kutalikirana ndi kumadzulo, koteronso Iye watichotsera mphulupulu zathu kuti zikhale kutali nafe.

13.verse: Monga bambo amachitira chifundo ana ake, choncho Yehova ali ndi chifundo ndi iwo amene amamuopa;

14.verse: pakuti Iye amadziwa momwe tinawumbidwira, amakumbukira kuti ndife fumbi.

15.verse: Kunena za munthu, masiku ake ali ngati udzu, amaphuka ngati duwa la mʼmunda;

16.verse: koma mphepo imawombapo ndipo silionekanso ndipo malo ake sakumbukirikanso.

17.verse: Koma kuchokera muyaya mpaka muyaya chikondi cha Yehova chili ndi iwo amene amamuopa, ndi chilungamo chake chili ndi ana a ana awo;

18.verse: iwo amene amasunga pangano lake ndi kukumbukira kumvera malangizo ake.

19.verse: Yehova wakhazikitsa mpando wake waufumu mmwamba ndipo ufumu wake umalamulira onse.

20.verse: Tamandani Yehova, inu angelo ake, amphamvu inu amene mumachita zimene amalamula, amene mumamvera mawu ake.

21.verse: Tamandani Yehova, zolengedwa zonse zakumwamba, inu atumiki ake amene mumachita chifuniro chake.

22.verse: Tamandani Yehova, ntchito yake yonse kulikonse mu ulamuliro wake. Tamanda Yehova, iwe moyo wanga.

1.verse: Tamanda Yehova, iwe moyo wanga. Inu Yehova Mulungu wanga, ndinu wamkulu kwambiri; mwavala ulemerero ndi ufumu.

2.verse: Iye wadzifunditsa kuwala ngati chovala; watambasula miyamba ngati tenti

3.verse: ndipo wayika pa madzi mitanda ya chipinda chake. Iye amasandutsa mitambo kukhala galeta lake, ndi kuwuluka pa mapiko a mphepo.

4.verse: Amapanga mphepo kukhala amithenga ake, malawi amoto kukhala atumiki ake.

5.verse: Anakhazikitsa dziko lapansi pa maziko ake; silingasunthike.

6.verse: Munaliphimba ndi nyanja yozama ngati chovala; madzi anayimirira pamwamba pa mapiri.

7.verse: Koma pakudzudzula kwanu madzi anathawa, pa mkokomo wa bingu lanu iwo anamwazika;

8.verse: Inu munamiza mapiri, iwo anatsikira ku zigwa kumalo kumene munawakonzera.

9.verse: Inu munayika malire ndipo sangathe kudutsa, iwo sadzamizanso dziko lapansi.

10.verse: Iye achititsa akasupe kutulutsa madzi kupita ku zigwa; madziwo amayenda pakati pa mapiri.

11.verse: Iwo amapereka madzi kwa zirombo zonse zakuthengo; abulu akuthengo amapha ludzu lawo.

12.verse: Mbalame zamlengalenga zimayika zisa mʼmbali mwa madzi; zimayimba pakati pa thambo.

13.verse: Iye amathirira mapiri kuchokera ku zipinda zake zapamwamba; dziko lapansi limakhutitsidwa ndi chipatso cha ntchito yake.

14.verse: Amameretsa udzu kuti ngʼombe zidye, ndi zomera, kuti munthu azilima kubweretsa chakudya kuchokera mʼdziko lapansi:

15.verse: vinyo amene amasangalatsa mtima wa munthu, mafuta amene amachititsa nkhope yake kuwala, ndi buledi amene amapereka mphamvu.

16.verse: Mitengo ya Yehova ndi yothiriridwa bwino, mikungudza ya ku Lebanoni imene Iye anadzala.

17.verse: Mbalame zimamanga zisa zawo; kakowa ali ndi malo ake mʼmikungudzamo.

18.verse: Mapiri ataliatali ndi a mbalale; mʼmingʼalu ya miyala ndi mobisalamo mbira.

19.verse: Mwezi umasiyanitsa nyengo ndipo dzuwa limadziwa nthawi yake yolowera.

20.verse: Inu mumabweretsa mdima nukhala usiku, ndipo zirombo zonse za ku nkhalango zimatuluka.

21.verse: Mikango imabangula kufuna nyama, ndi kufunafuna chakudya chawo kuchokera kwa Mulungu.

22.verse: Dzuwa limatuluka ndipo iyo imapita kukabisala; imabwerera kukagona pansi mʼmapanga awo.

23.verse: Pamenepo munthu amapita ku ntchito yake, kukagwira ntchito yake mpaka madzulo.

24.verse: Ntchito zanu ndi zochulukadi Inu Yehova! Munazipanga zonse mwanzeru, dziko lapansi ladzaza ndi zolengedwa zanu.

25.verse: Kuli nyanja yayikulu ndi yotambalala, yodzaza ndi zolengedwa zosawerengeka, zamoyo zanu zazikulu ndi zazingʼono zomwe.

26.verse: Kumeneko sitima zapamadzi zimayenda uku ndi uku, ndiponso Leviyatani amene munamulenga kuti asewere kumeneko.

27.verse: Zonsezi zimayangʼana kwa Inu kuti muzipatse chakudya chawo pa nthawi yake yoyenera.

28.verse: Mukazipatsa, zimachisonkhanitsa pamodzi; mukatsekula dzanja lanu, izo zimakhutitsidwa ndi zinthu zabwino.

29.verse: Mukabisa nkhope yanu, izo zimachita mantha aakulu; mukachotsa mpweya wawo, zimafa ndi kubwerera ku fumbi.

30.verse: Mukatumiza mzimu wanu, izo zimalengedwa ndipo mumakozanso maonekedwe a dziko lapansi.

31.verse: Ulemerero wa Yehova ukhalebe mpaka muyaya; Yehova akondwere ndi ntchito ya manja ake;

32.verse: Iye amene amayangʼana dziko lapansi ndipo limanjenjemera, amene amakhudza mapiri ndipo amatuluka utsi.

33.verse: Ine ndidzayimbira Yehova moyo wanga wonse; ndidzayimbira matamando Mulungu wanga nthawi yonse imene ndili ndi moyo.

34.verse: Zolingalira zanga zikhale zomukomera Iye, pamene ndikusangalala mwa Yehova.

35.verse: Koma anthu ochimwa awonongeke pa dziko lapansi ndipo anthu oyipa asapezekenso. Tamanda Yehova, Iwe moyo wanga. Tamandani Yehova.

1.verse: Yamikani Yehova, itanani dzina lake; lalikirani pakati pa anthu a mitundu ina zimene Iye wachita.

2.verse: Imbirani Iye, imbani matamando kwa Iyeyo; fotokozani za machitidwe ake onse odabwitsa.

3.verse: Munyadire dzina lake loyera; mitima ya iwo amene amafunafuna Yehova ikondwere.

4.verse: Dalirani Yehova ndi mphamvu zake; funafunani nkhope yake nthawi yonse.

5.verse: Kumbukirani zodabwitsa zimene Iye anazichita, zozizwitsa zake ndi maweruzo amene anapereka,

6.verse: inu zidzukulu za Abrahamu mtumiki wake, inu ana a Yakobo, osankhika ake.

7.verse: Iye ndiye Yehova Mulungu wathu; maweruzo ake ali pa dziko lonse lapansi.

8.verse: Iyeyo amakumbukira pangano lake kwamuyaya, mawu amene analamula kwa mibado yonse,

9.verse: pangano limene Iye anapanga ndi Abrahamu, lumbiro limene analumbira kwa Isake.

10.verse: Iye analitsimikiza kwa Yakobo monga zophunzitsa, kwa Israeli monga pangano lamuyaya:

11.verse: “Ndidzapereka kwa iwe dziko la Kanaani ngati gawo la cholowa chako.”

12.verse: Pamene iwo anali ngati anthu ochepa mʼchiwerengero, ochepa ndithu, ndiponso alendo mʼdzikolo,

13.verse: ankayendayenda kuchoka ku mtundu wina wa anthu ndi kupita ku mtundu wina, kuchoka mu ufumu wina kupita ku wina.

14.verse: Iye sanalole wina aliyense kuwapondereza; anadzudzula mafumu chifukwa cha iwo:

15.verse: “Musakhudze odzozedwa anga; musachitire choyipa aneneri anga.”

16.verse: Iye anabweretsa njala pa dziko ndipo anawononga chakudya chonse;

17.verse: Iyeyo anatumiza munthu patsogolo pawo, Yosefe anagulitsidwa ngati kapolo.

18.verse: Iwo anavulaza mapazi ake ndi matangadza, khosi lake analiyika mʼzitsulo,

19.verse: mpaka zimene Iye ananeneratu zitakwaniritsidwa, mpaka mawu a Yehova ataonetsa kuti Iye ananena zoona.

20.verse: Mfumu inatuma munthu kukamumasula, wolamulira wa mitundu ya anthu anamasula iyeyo.

21.verse: Anamuyika kukhala wolamulira nyumba yake, wolamulira zonse zimene iye anali nazo,

22.verse: kulangiza ana a mfumu monga ankafunira ndi kuphunzitsa nzeru akuluakulu.

23.verse: Tsono Israeli analowa mu Igupto; Yakobo anakhala monga mlendo mʼdziko la Hamu.

24.verse: Yehova anachulukitsa anthu ake; ndipo anachititsa kuti akhale ochuluka kwambiri kuposa adani awo;

25.verse: amene mitima yawo anayitembenuza kuti idane ndi anthu ake, kukonzera chiwembu atumiki ake.

26.verse: Yehova anatuma Mose mtumiki wake, ndi Aaroni amene Iye anamusankha.

27.verse: Iwo anachita zizindikiro zozizwitsa pakati pawo, zodabwitsa zake mʼdziko la Hamu.

28.verse: Yehova anatumiza mdima nasandutsa dziko kuti likhale la mdima. Koma anthuwo anakaniratu mawu a Yehova.

29.verse: Yehova anasandutsa madzi awo kukhala magazi, kuchititsa kuti nsomba zawo zife.

30.verse: Dziko lawo linadzaza ndi achule amene analowa mʼzipinda zogona za olamulira awo.

31.verse: Iye anayankhula, ndipo kunabwera ntchentche zochuluka ndi nsabwe mʼdziko lawo lonse.

32.verse: Iyeyo anatembenuza mvula yawo kukhala matalala, ndi zingʼaningʼani mʼdziko lawo lonse;

33.verse: Anagwetsa mitengo yawo ya mpesa ndi mitengo yawo ya mkuyu, nawononganso mitengo ina ya mʼdziko lawolo.

34.verse: Iye anayankhula, ndipo dzombe linabwera, ziwala zosawerengeka;

35.verse: zinadya chilichonse chobiriwira cha mʼdziko lawo, zinadya zonse zotuluka mʼnthaka yawo.

36.verse: Kenaka anakantha ana onse oyamba kubadwa a mʼdziko lawo, zipatso zoyamba za umunthu wawo wonse.

37.verse: Yehova anatulutsa Israeli, atatenga siliva ndi golide wambiri, ndipo pakati pa mafuko awo palibe mmodzi amene anafowoka.

38.verse: Dziko la Igupto linakondwa pamene iwo anachoka, pakuti kuopsa kwa Israeli kunawagwera iwo.

39.verse: Iye anatambasula mitambo ngati chofunda chawo, ndi moto owawunikira usiku.

40.verse: Iwo anapempha, ndipo Iye anawabweretsera zinziri ndipo anawakhutitsa ndi chakudya chochokera kumwamba.

41.verse: Iye anatsekula thanthwe, ndipo madzi anatuluka; ngati mtsinje anayenda mʼchipululu.

42.verse: Pakuti anakumbukira lonjezo lake loyera limene linaperekedwa kwa Abrahamu mtumiki wake.

43.verse: Iye anatulutsa anthu ake akukondwera, osankhika ake akufuwula mwachimwemwe;

44.verse: Iye anawapatsa mayiko a anthu a mitundu ina ndipo anakhala olowamʼmalo a zimene ena anazivutikira,

45.verse: kuti iwo asunge malangizo ake ndi kutsatira malamulo ake. Tamandani Yehova.

1.verse: Tamandani Yehova. Yamikani Yehova chifukwa ndi wabwino; pakuti chikondi chake ndi chosatha.

2.verse: Ndani angathe kufotokoza za ntchito zamphamvu za Yehova kapena kumutamanda mokwanira?

3.verse: Odala ndi amene amasunga chilungamo, amene amachita zolungama nthawi zonse.

4.verse: Mundikumbukire Yehova, pamene mukuonetsa kukoma mtima kwanu kwa anthu anu, bwerani mudzandithandize pamene mukuwapulumutsa iwo,

5.verse: kuti ndidzasangalale ndi chuma cha anthu anu osankhika, kuti ndidzakhale nacho chimwemwe cha anthu anu ndi kukhala pamodzi ndi cholowa chanu pa kukutamandani.

6.verse: Ife tachimwa monga momwe anachitira makolo athu; tachita zolakwa ndipo tachita moyipa.

7.verse: Pamene makolo athu anali mu Igupto, sanalingalire za zozizwitsa zanu; iwo sanakumbukire kukoma mtima kwanu kochuluka, ndipo anawukira Inu pa Nyanja Yofiira.

8.verse: Komabe Iye anawapulumutsa chifukwa cha dzina lake, kuti aonetse mphamvu zake zazikulu.

9.verse: Anadzudzula Nyanja Yofiira, ndipo inawuma; anawatsogolera mʼnyanja yakuya ngati akuyenda mʼchipululu.

10.verse: Anawapulumutsa mʼdzanja la amaliwongo; anawawombola mʼdzanja la mdani.

11.verse: Madzi anamiza adani awo, palibe mmodzi wa iwo anapulumuka.

12.verse: Kenaka iwo anakhulupirira malonjezo ake ndi kuyimba nyimbo zamatamando.

13.verse: Koma posachedwa anayiwala zimene Iye anachita, ndipo sanayembekezere uphungu wake.

14.verse: Mʼchipululu, anadzipereka ku zilakolako zawo; mʼdziko lopanda kanthu anayesa Mulungu.

15.verse: Choncho Iye anawapatsa chimene anapempha, koma anatumiza nthenda yowondetsa.

16.verse: Mʼmisasa, anachitira nsanje Mose ndi Aaroni, amene Yehova anadzipatulira.

17.verse: Nthaka inatsekuka ndipo inameza Datani; inakwirira gulu la Abiramu.

18.verse: Moto unayaka pakati pa otsatira awo; lawi lamoto linapsereza anthu oyipa.

19.verse: Iwo anapanga mwana wangʼombe pa Horebu ndi kulambira fano loyengedwa kuchokera ku chitsulo.

20.verse: Anasinthanitsa ulemerero wawo ndi fano la ngʼombe yayimuna imene imadya udzu.

21.verse: Anayiwala Mulungu amene anawapulumutsa, amene anachita zinthu zazikulu mu Igupto,

22.verse: zozizwitsa mʼdziko la Hamu ndi machitidwe ake woopsa pa Nyanja Yofiira.

23.verse: Choncho Iye anawawuza kuti adzawawononga, pakanapanda Mose, mtumiki wake wosankhidwa, kuyima pamaso pake, ndi kuletsa mkwiyo wake kuti usawawononge.

24.verse: Motero iwo ananyoza dziko lokoma; sanakhulupirire malonjezo ake.

25.verse: Anangʼungʼudza mʼmatenti mwawo ndipo sanamvere Yehova.

26.verse: Kotero Iye analumbira atakweza dzanja lake, kuti adzachititsa kuti iwowo afere mʼchipululu,

27.verse: kuchititsa kuti zidzukulu zawo zifere pakati pa anthu a mitundu ina ndi kuwabalalitsa mʼdziko lonse.

28.verse: Iwo anayamba kupembedza Baala-Peori ndi kudya nsembe zoperekedwa kwa milungu yopanda moyo;

29.verse: anaputa mkwiyo wa Yehova pa machitidwe awo oyipa, ndipo mliri unabuka pakati pawo.

30.verse: Koma Finehasi anayimirira ndi kulowererapo, ndipo mliri unaleka.

31.verse: Chimenechi ndicho chinayesedwa chilungamo chake, kwa mibado yosatha imene ikubwera.

32.verse: Pa madzi a ku Meriba iwo anakwiyitsa Yehova ndipo mavuto anabwera kwa Mose chifukwa cha anthuwo,

33.verse: pakuti iwowo anawukira mzimu wa Mulungu, ndipo pa milomo ya Mose panatuluka mawu osayenera.

34.verse: Aisraeliwo sanawononge mitundu ya anthu monga momwe Yehova anawalamulira.

35.verse: Koma anasakanizana ndi anthu a mitundu inayo ndi kuphunzira miyambo yawo.

36.verse: Ndipo anapembedza mafano awo, amene anakhala msampha kwa iwowo.

37.verse: Anapereka nsembe ana awo aamuna ndi ana awo aakazi kwa ziwanda.

38.verse: Anakhetsa magazi a anthu osalakwa, magazi a ana awo aamuna ndi a ana awo aakazi, amene anawapereka nsembe kwa mafano a ku Kanaani, ndipo dziko linayipitsidwa ndi magazi awo.

39.verse: Iwo anadzidetsa okha ndi zimene anachita; ndi machitidwe awo amakhala ngati munthu wachigololo.

40.verse: Tsono Yehova anakwiya ndi anthu ake ndipo ananyansidwa ndi cholowa chake.

41.verse: Iye anawapereka kwa anthu a mitundu ina, ndipo adani awo anawalamulira.

42.verse: Adani awo anawazunza ndi kuwakhazika pansi pa mphamvu yawo.

43.verse: Iye ankawapulumutsa nthawi zambiri, koma iwo ankatsimikiza za kuwukira ndipo anawonongeka mʼmachimo awo.

44.verse: Koma Iye anaona kuzunzika kwawo pamene anamva kulira kwawo;

45.verse: Chifukwa cha iwo Iye anakumbukira pangano lake ndipo anawalezera mtima chifukwa cha kukula kwa chikondi chake.

46.verse: Iye anachititsa kuti amene anawagwira iwo ukapolo awamvere chisoni.

47.verse: Tipulumutseni Inu Yehova Mulungu wathu, ndipo mutisonkhanitse kuchoka kwa anthu a mitundu ina kuti tithe kuyamika dzina lanu loyera ndi kunyadira mʼmatamando anu.

48.verse: Atamandike Yehova, Mulungu wa Israeli, Kuyambira muyaya mpaka muyaya. Anthu onse anene kuti, “Ameni!” Tamandani Yehova.

1.verse: BUKU LACHISANU - Masalimo 107–150 Yamikani Yehova chifukwa ndi wabwino; pakuti chikondi chake ndi chosatha.

2.verse: Owomboledwa a Yehova anene zimenezi amene Iyeyo anawawombola mʼdzanja la mdani,

3.verse: iwo amene anawasonkhanitsa kuchokera ku mayiko, kuchokera kumadzulo ndi kummawa, kuchokera kumpoto ndi kummwera.

4.verse: Ena anayendayenda mʼchipululu mopanda kanthu, osapeza njira yopitira ku mzinda kumene akanakakhazikikako.

5.verse: Iwo anamva njala ndi ludzu, ndipo miyoyo yawo inafowokeratu.

6.verse: Pamenepo analirira Yehova mʼmavuto awo ndipo Iye anawapulumutsa ku masautso awo.

7.verse: Iye anawatsogolera mʼnjira yowongoka kupita ku mzinda umene anakakhazikikako.

8.verse: Ayamike Yehova chifukwa cha chikondi chake chosatha ndi chifukwa cha machitidwe ake odabwitsa kwa anthu onse,

9.verse: pakuti Iye wapha ludzu la munthu womva ludzu ndipo wakhutitsa wanjala ndi zinthu zabwino.

10.verse: Ena anakhala mu mdima ndi mʼchisoni chachikulu, amʼndende ovutika mʼmaunyolo achitsulo,

11.verse: pakuti iwowo anawukira mawu a Mulungu ndi kunyoza uphungu wa Wammwambamwamba.

12.verse: Kotero Iye anawapereka kuti agwire ntchito yakalavulagaga; anagwa pansi ndipo panalibe woti awathandize.

13.verse: Pamenepo analirira Yehova mʼmasautso awo ndipo Iye anawapulumutsa ku masautso awo.

14.verse: Yehova anawatulutsa mu mdima ndi mʼchisoni chachikulu ndipo anadula maunyolo awo.

15.verse: Ayamike Yehova chifukwa cha chikondi chake chosatha ndi machitidwe ake odabwitsa kwa anthu onse,

16.verse: pakuti Iye amathyola zipata zamkuwa ndi kudula pakati mipiringidzo yachitsulo.

17.verse: Ena anakhala zitsiru chifukwa cha njira zawo zowukira, ndipo anamva zowawa chifukwa cha mphulupulu zawo.

18.verse: Iwo ananyansidwa ndi chakudya chilichonse ndipo anafika pafupi ndi zipata za imfa.

19.verse: Pamenepo analirira Yehova mʼmasautso awo ndipo Iye anawapulumutsa ku masautso awowo.

20.verse: Iye anatumiza mawu ake ndi kuwachiritsa; anawalanditsa ku manda.

21.verse: Ayamike Yehova chifukwa cha chikondi chake chosatha ndi machitidwe ake odabwitsa kwa anthu.

22.verse: Apereke nsembe yachiyamiko ndi kufotokoza za ntchito zake ndi nyimbo zachimwemwe.

23.verse: Ena anayenda pa nyanja mʼsitima zapamadzi; Iwo anali anthu amalonda pa nyanja yayikulu.

24.verse: Anaona ntchito za Yehova, machitidwe ake odabwitsa mʼnyanja yakuya.

25.verse: Pakuti Iye anayankhula ndi kuwutsa mphepo yamkuntho imene inabweretsa mafunde ataliatali.

26.verse: Sitima za pamadzizo zinatukulidwa mmwamba ndi kutsikira pansi pakuya; pamene amawonongeka, kulimba mtima kwawo kunasungunuka.

27.verse: Anachita chizungulire ndi kudzandira ngati anthu oledzera; anali pa mapeto a moyo wawo.

28.verse: Pamenepo analirira Yehova mʼmasautso awo ndipo Iyeyo anawapulumutsa ku masautso awo.

29.verse: Yehova analetsa namondwe, mafunde a mʼnyanja anatontholetsedwa.

30.verse: Anali osangalala pamene kunakhala bata, ndipo Iye anawatsogolera ku dooko limene amalifuna.

31.verse: Ayamike Yehova chifukwa cha chikondi chake chosatha ndi machitidwe ake odabwitsa kwa anthu.

32.verse: Akuze Iye mu msonkhano wa anthu ndi kumutamanda pabwalo la akuluakulu.

33.verse: Iye anasandutsa mitsinje kukhala chipululu, akasupe otuluka madzi kukhala nthaka yowuma,

34.verse: ndiponso nthaka yachonde kukhala nthaka yamchere, chifukwa cha kuyipa kwa amene amakhala kumeneko.

35.verse: Anasandutsa chipululu kukhala mayiwe a madzi ndi nthaka yowuma kukhala akasupe a madzi oyenda;

36.verse: kumeneko Iye anabweretsa anthu anjala kuti azikhalako, ndipo iwo anamanga mzinda woti akhazikikeko.

37.verse: Anafesa mbewu mʼminda ndi kudzala mipesa ndipo anakolola zipatso zochuluka;

38.verse: Yehova anawadalitsa, ndipo chiwerengero chawo chinachuluka kwambiri, ndipo Iye sanalole kuti ziweto zawo zithe.

39.verse: Kenaka chiwerengero chawo chinachepa ndipo iwo anatsitsidwa chifukwa cha mazunzo, mavuto ndi chisoni;

40.verse: Iye amene amakhuthulira mʼnyozo pa olemekezeka anawachititsa kuyendayenda mʼmalo owumawo wopanda njira.

41.verse: Koma Iyeyo anakweza anthu osowa kuchoka ku masautso awo ngati magulu a nkhosa.

42.verse: Anthu olungama mtima amaona ndi kusangalala, koma anthu onse oyipa amatseka pakamwa pawo.

43.verse: Aliyense wanzeru asamalitse zinthu zimenezi ndi kuganizira za chikondi chachikulu cha Yehova.

1.verse: Nyimbo. Salimo la Davide. Mtima wanga ndi wokhazikika, Inu Mulungu; ndidzayimba nyimbo, inde ndidzayimba nyimbo zotamanda ndi moyo wanga wonse.

2.verse: Dzukani, zeze ndi pangwe! Ine ndidzadzutsa mʼbandakucha.

3.verse: Ndidzakutamandani Yehova, pakati pa anthu a mitundu ina; ndidzayimba za Inu pakati pa anthu a mitundu ina.

4.verse: Pakuti chikondi chanu nʼchachikulu, kutalika kwake kuposa kumwamba; kukhulupirika kwanu kumafika mlengalenga.

5.verse: Kwezekani Inu Mulungu, kuposa mayiko akumwamba, ndipo ulemerero wanu uphimbe dziko lonse lapansi.

6.verse: Tipulumutseni ndi kutithandiza ndi dzanja lanu lamanja kuti iwo amene mumawakonda apulumutsidwe.

7.verse: Mulungu wayankhula kuchokera ku malo ake opatulika: “Mwachipambano Ine ndidzagawa Sekemu ndipo ndidzayesa chigwa cha Sukoti.

8.verse: Giliyadi ndi wanga, Manase ndi wanganso; Efereimu ndi chipewa changa chodzitetezera, Yuda ndi ndodo yanga yaufumu.

9.verse: Mowabu ndi mbale yanga yosambiramo ndidzaponya nsapato zanga pa Edomu; ndidzafuwula mopambana pa Filisitiya.”

10.verse: Ndani adzandifikitsa ku mzinda wotetezedwa? Ndani adzanditsogolera ku Edomu?

11.verse: Kodi sindinu Mulungu, Inu amene mwatikana ndipo simuperekezanso magulu athu ankhondo?

12.verse: Tithandizeni ife kulimbana ndi mdani, pakuti thandizo la munthu ndi lopanda pake.

13.verse: Chifukwa cha Mulungu wathu, ife tidzapeza chipambano, ndipo adzapondereza pansi adani athu.

1.verse: Kwa mtsogoleri wamayimbidwe. Salimo la Davide. Mulungu amene ndimakutamandani, musakhale chete,

2.verse: pakuti anthu oyipa ndi achinyengo atsekula pakamwa pawo kutsutsana nane; iwo ayankhula motsutsana nane ndi malilime abodza.

3.verse: Andizungulira ndi mawu audani, amandinena popanda chifukwa.

4.verse: Mʼmalo mwa chikondi changa amandineneza, koma ine ndine munthu wapemphero.

5.verse: Iwo amandibwezera zoyipa mʼmalo mwa zabwino, ndi udani mʼmalo mwa chikondi changa.

6.verse: Sankhani munthu woyipa kuti amutsutse iye; lolani wotsutsa ayime ku dzanja lake lamanja.

7.verse: Pamene aweruzidwa, apezeke kuti ndi wolakwa, ndipo mapemphero ake amutsutse.

8.verse: Masiku ake akhale owerengeka; munthu wina atenge malo ake a utsogoleri.

9.verse: Ana ake akhale amasiye ndipo mkazi wake akhale wopanda mwamuna.

10.verse: Ana ake akhale oyendayenda ndi opemphapempha; apirikitsidwe kuchoka pa mabwinja a nyumba zawo.

11.verse: Wokongoza alande zonse zimene ali nazo; alendo afunkhe ntchito za manja ake.

12.verse: Pasapezeke ndi mmodzi yemwe womukomera mtima kapena kumvera chisoni ana ake amasiye.

13.verse: Zidzukulu zake zithe nʼkufa, mayina awo afafanizidwe mu mʼbado wotsatirawo.

14.verse: Mphulupulu za makolo ake zikumbukiridwe pamaso pa Yehova; tchimo la amayi ake lisadzafafanizidwe.

15.verse: Machimo awo akhale pamaso pa Yehova nthawi zonse, kuti Iye achotse chikumbutso chawo pa dziko lapansi.

16.verse: Pakuti iye sanaganizirepo zochita chifundo, koma anazunza mpaka kuwapha anthu osauka ndi osweka mtima.

17.verse: Anakonda kutemberera, matembererowo abwerere kwa iye; sanakondwe nʼkudalitsa anthu ena, choncho madalitso akhale kutali naye.

18.verse: Anavala kutemberera ngati chovala; kutemberera kunalowa mʼthupi lake ngati madzi, kulowa mʼmafupa ake ngati mafuta.

19.verse: Matemberero akhale ngati chofunda chodzikutira nacho, ngati lamba wovala tsiku ndi tsiku.

20.verse: Awa akhale malipiro ochokera kwa Yehova pa onditsutsa anga, kwa iwo amene amayankhula zoyipa za ine.

21.verse: Koma Inu Ambuye Wamphamvuzonse, muchite nane molingana ndi dzina lanu, chifukwa cha ubwino wa chikondi chanu, pulumutseni.

22.verse: Pakuti ndine wosauka ndi wosowa, ndipo mtima wanga ukuwawa mʼkati mwanga.

23.verse: Ndikuzimirira ngati mthunzi wa kumadzulo, ndapirikitsidwa ngati dzombe.

24.verse: Mawondo anga afowoka chifukwa cha kusala zakudya, thupi langa lawonda ndi mutu wanga womwe.

25.verse: Ndine chinthu chotonzedwa kwa otsutsana nane; akandiona, amapukusa mitu yawo.

26.verse: Thandizeni Inu Yehova Mulungu wanga; pulumutseni molingana ndi chikondi chanu.

27.verse: Adaniwo adziwe kuti limeneli ndi dzanja lanu, kuti Inu Yehova mwachita zimenezi.

28.verse: Angathe kutemberera, koma Inu mudzadalitsa; pamene iwo andiputa adzachititsidwa manyazi, koma mtumiki wanu adzasangalala.

29.verse: Onditsutsa adzavekedwa mnyozo, ndipo adzadzifunditsa manyazi ngati chovala.

30.verse: Ndi pakamwa panga ndidzathokoza Yehova kwambiri; ndidzamutamanda mʼgulu lalikulu la anthu.

31.verse: Popeza Iye amayima ku dzanja lamanja la munthu wosowayo, kupulumutsa moyo wake kwa iwo amene agamula molakwa.

1.verse: Salimo la Davide. Yehova akuwuza Mbuye wanga kuti, “Khala ku dzanja langa lamanja mpaka nditasandutsa adani ako kukhala chopondapo mapazi ako.”

2.verse: Yehova adzakuza ndodo yamphamvu ya ufumu wako kuchokera mʼZiyoni; udzalamulira pakati pa adani ako.

3.verse: Ankhondo ako adzakhala odzipereka pa tsiku lako la nkhondo. Atavala chiyero chaulemerero, kuchokera mʼmimba ya mʼbandakucha, udzalandira mame a unyamata wako.

4.verse: Yehova walumbira ndipo sadzasintha maganizo ake: “Ndiwe wansembe mpaka muyaya monga mwa unsembe wa Melikizedeki.”

5.verse: Ambuye ali kudzanja lako lamanja; Iye adzaponda mafumu pa tsiku la ukali wake.

6.verse: Adzaweruza anthu a mitundu ina, adzadzaza dziko lapansi ndi mitembo ndipo adzaphwanya olamulira a pa dziko lonse lapansi.

7.verse: Iye adzamwa mu mtsinje wa mʼmbali mwa njira; choncho adzaweramutsa mutu wake.

1.verse: Tamandani Yehova. Ndidzathokoza Yehova ndi mtima wanga wonse mʼbwalo la anthu olungama mtima ndi pa msonkhano.

2.verse: Ntchito za Yehova nʼzazikulu; onse amene amakondwera nazo amazilingalira.

3.verse: Zochita zake ndi za ulemerero ndi zaufumu, ndipo chilungamo chake ndi chosatha.

4.verse: Iye wachititsa kuti zodabwitsa zake zikumbukirike; Yehova ndi wokoma mtima ndi wachifundo.

5.verse: Amapereka chakudya kwa amene amamuopa Iye; amakumbukira pangano lake kwamuyaya.

6.verse: Waonetsa anthu ake mphamvu ya ntchito zake, kuwapatsa mayiko a anthu a mitundu ina.

7.verse: Ntchito za manja ake ndi zokhulupirika ndi zolungama; malangizo ake onse ndi odalirika.

8.verse: Malamulo ndi okhazikika ku nthawi za nthawi, ochitidwa mokhulupirika ndi molungama.

9.verse: Iyeyo amawombola anthu ake; anakhazikitsa pangano lake kwamuyaya dzina lake ndi loyera ndi loopsa.

10.verse: Kuopa Yehova ndicho chiyambi cha nzeru; onse amene amatsatira malangizo ake amamvetsa bwino zinthu. Iye ndi wotamandika mpaka muyaya.

1.verse: Tamandani Yehova. Wodala munthu amene amaopa Yehova, amene amakondwera kwambiri ndi malamulo ake.

2.verse: Ana ake adzakhala amphamvu mʼdziko; mʼbado wa olungama mtima udzadalitsidwa.

3.verse: Kulemera ndi chuma zili mʼnyumba yake, ndipo chilungamo chake ndi chosatha.

4.verse: Ngakhale mu mdima kuwala kumatulukira olungama mtima; wokoma mtima, wachifundo ndi wowongoka mtima.

5.verse: Zinthu zabwino zidzabwera kwa iye amene amapereka mowolowamanja ndi wokongoletsa mwaufulu, amene amachita ntchito yake mwachilungamo.

6.verse: Ndithu sadzagwedezeka; munthu wolungama sadzayiwalika mpaka muyaya.

7.verse: Saopa akamva zoyipa zimene zachitika; mtima wake ndi wokhazikika ndipo amadalira Yehova.

8.verse: Mtima wake ndi wotetezedwa, sadzakhala ndi mantha; potsiriza pake adzayangʼana adani ake mwachipambano.

9.verse: Wopereka mphatso zake mowolowamanja kwa osauka, chilungamo chake chimanka mpaka muyaya; nyanga yake idzakwezedwa mwaulemu.

10.verse: Munthu woyipa adzaona zimenezi ndipo adzapsa mtima; adzakukuta mano ake ndipo adzasungunuka. Zolakalaka za anthu oyipa sizidzachitika konse.

1.verse: Tamandani Yehova. Mutamandeni, inu atumiki a Yehova, tamandani dzina la Yehova.

2.verse: Yehova atamandidwe, kuyambira tsopano mpaka muyaya.

3.verse: Kuyambira ku matulukiro a dzuwa mpaka ku malowero ake, dzina la Yehova liyenera kutamandidwa.

4.verse: Yehova wakwezeka pa anthu a mitundu yonse, ulemerero wake ndi woposa mayiko akumwamba.

5.verse: Ndani wofanana ndi Yehova Mulungu wathu, Iye amene amakhala mwaufumu mmwamba?

6.verse: amene amawerama pansi kuyangʼana miyamba ndi dziko lapansi?

7.verse: Iye amakweza munthu wosauka kuchoka pa fumbi ndi kutukula munthu wosowa kuchoka pa dzala;

8.verse: amawakhazika pamodzi ndi mafumu, pamodzi ndi mafumu a anthu ake.

9.verse: Amakhazikitsa mayi wosabereka mʼnyumba yake monga mayi wa ana wosangalala. Tamandani Yehova.

1.verse: Pamene Israeli anatuluka mu Igupto, nyumba ya Yakobo kuchoka ku mtundu wa anthu a chiyankhulo chachilendo,

2.verse: Yuda anasanduka malo opatulika a Mulungu, Israeli anasanduka ufumu wake.

3.verse: Nyanja inaona ndi kuthawa, mtsinje wa Yorodani unabwerera mʼmbuyo;

4.verse: mapiri analumphalumpha ngati nkhosa zazimuna, timapiri ngati ana ankhosa.

5.verse: Nʼchifukwa chiyani iwe unathawa? iwe mtsinje wa Yorodani unabwereranji mʼmbuyo?

6.verse: inu mapiri, munalumphalumphiranji ngati nkhosa zazimuna, inu timapiri, ngati ana ankhosa?

7.verse: Njenjemera pamaso pa Ambuye iwe dziko lapansi, pamaso pa Mulungu wa Yakobo,

8.verse: amene anasandutsa thanthwe kukhala chitsime, thanthwe lolimba kukhala akasupe a madzi.

1.verse: Kwa ife ayi Yehova, kwa ife ayi koma ulemerero ukhale pa dzina lanu, chifukwa cha chikondi chanu chosasinthika ndiponso chifukwa cha kukhulupirika kwanu.

2.verse: Chifukwa chiyani anthu a mitundu ina akunena kuti, “Mulungu wawo ali kuti?”

3.verse: Mulungu wathu ali kumwamba; Iye amachita chilichonse chimene chimamukondweretsa.

4.verse: Koma mafano awo ndi siliva ndi golide, opangidwa ndi manja a anthu.

5.verse: Pakamwa ali napo koma sayankhula, maso ali nawo koma sapenya;

6.verse: makutu ali nawo koma samva, mphuno ali nazo koma sanunkhiza;

7.verse: manja ali nawo koma akakhudza samva kanthu; mapazi ali nawo koma sayenda; kapena pakhosi pawo kutulutsa mawu.

8.verse: Anthu amene amapanga mafanowo adzafanana nawo, chimodzimodzinso onse amene amadalira mafanowo.

9.verse: Inu Aisraeli, dalirani Yehova; Iye ndiye thandizo lanu ndi chishango chanu.

10.verse: Iwe nyumba ya Aaroni, dalira Yehova; Iye ndiye thandizo lako ndi chishango chako.

11.verse: Inu amene mumaopa Iye, dalirani Yehova; Iye ndiye thandizo lanu ndi chishango chanu.

12.verse: Yehova watikumbukira ndipo adzatidalitsa: adzadalitsa nyumba ya Israeli, adzadalitsa nyumba ya Aaroni,

13.verse: adzadalitsa iwo amene amaopa Yehova; aangʼono ndi aakulu omwe.

14.verse: Yehova akuwonjezereni madalitso; inuyo pamodzi ndi ana anu.

15.verse: Mudalitsidwe ndi Yehova, Wolenga kumwamba ndi dziko lapansi.

16.verse: Kumwamba ndi kwa Yehova, koma dziko lapansi Iye walipereka kwa anthu.

17.verse: Si anthu akufa amene amatamanda Yehova, amene amatsikira kuli chete;

18.verse: ndi ife amene timatamanda Yehova, kuyambira tsopano mpaka muyaya. Tamandani Yehova.

1.verse: Ndimakonda Yehova pakuti Iyeyo amamva mawu anga; Iye amamva kulira kwanga kopempha chifundo.

2.verse: Pakuti ananditchera khutu, ndidzayitana Iye masiku onse a moyo wanga.

3.verse: Zingwe za imfa zinandizinga, zoopsa za ku dziko la anthu akufa zinandigwera; ndinapeza mavuto ndi chisoni.

4.verse: Pamenepo ndinayitana dzina la Yehova: “Inu Yehova, pulumutseni!”

5.verse: Yehova ndi wokoma mtima ndi wolungama Mulungu wathu ndi wodzaza ndi chifundo.

6.verse: Yehova amateteza munthu wodzichepetsa mtima; pamene ndinali ndi chosowa chachikulu, Iye anandipulumutsa.

7.verse: Pumula iwe moyo wanga, pakuti Yehova wakuchitira zokoma.

8.verse: Pakuti Inu Yehova mwapulumutsa moyo wanga ku imfa, maso anga ku misozi, mapazi anga kuti angapunthwe,

9.verse: kuti ine ndiyende pamaso pa Yehova mʼdziko la anthu amoyo.

10.verse: Ine ndinakhulupirira; choncho ndinati, “Ndasautsidwa kwambiri.”

11.verse: Ndipo ndili mʼnkhawa yanga ndinati, “Anthu onse ndi abodza.”

12.verse: Ndingamubwezere chiyani Yehova, chifukwa cha zokoma zake zonse zimene wandichitira?

13.verse: Ndidzakweza chikho cha chipulumutso ndipo ndidzayitana dzina la Yehova.

14.verse: Ndidzakwaniritsa malonjezo anga kwa Yehova pamaso pa anthu ake onse.

15.verse: Imfa ya anthu oyera mtima ndi yamtengowapatali pamaso pa Yehova.

16.verse: Inu Yehova, zoonadi ndine mtumiki wanu: ndine mtumiki wanu, mwana wa mdzakazi wanu; Inu mwamasula maunyolo anga.

17.verse: Ndidzapereka nsembe yachiyamiko kwa Inu ndipo ndidzayitanira pa dzina la Yehova.

18.verse: Ndidzakwaniritsa malonjezo anga kwa Yehova pamaso pa anthu ake onse,

19.verse: mʼmabwalo a nyumba ya Yehova, mʼkati mwako iwe Yerusalemu. Tamandani Yehova.

1.verse: Tamandani Yehova, inu anthu a mitundu yonse; mulemekezeni Iye, inu mitundu ya anthu.

2.verse: Pakuti chikondi chake pa ife ndi chachikulu, ndipo kukhulupirika kwa Yehova nʼkosatha. Tamandani Yehova.

1.verse: Yamikani Yehova chifukwa ndi wabwino; pakuti chikondi chake chosasinthika ndi chosatha.

2.verse: Israeli anene kuti: “Chikondi chake ndi chosatha.”

3.verse: Banja la Aaroni linene kuti, “Chikondi chake ndi chosatha.”

4.verse: Iwo amene amaopa Yehova anene kuti: “Chikondi chake ndi chosatha.”

5.verse: Ndili mʼmasautso anga ndinalirira Yehova, ndipo Iye anayankha pondichotsa mʼmasautsowo.

6.verse: Yehova ali nane; sindidzachita mantha. Munthu angandichite chiyani?

7.verse: Yehova ali nane; Iye ndiye thandizo langa. Ndidzayangʼana adani anga mwachipambano.

8.verse: Nʼkwabwino kuthawira kwa Yehova kusiyana ndi kudalira munthu.

9.verse: Nʼkwabwino kuthawira kwa Yehova kusiyana ndi kudalira mafumu.

10.verse: Anthu a mitundu yonse anandizinga, koma mʼdzina la Yehova ndinawawononga.

11.verse: Anandizinga mbali zonse, koma mʼdzina la Yehova ndinawawononga.

12.verse: Anandizinga ngati njuchi, koma anatha msanga ngati moto wapaminga; mʼdzina la Yehova ndinawawononga.

13.verse: Anandikankha uku ndi uko ndipo ndinali pafupi kugwa, koma Yehova anandithandiza.

14.verse: Yehova ndiye mphamvu yanga ndi nyimbo yanga; Iye wakhala chipulumutso changa.

15.verse: Mfuwu wachimwemwe ndi chipambano ukumveka mʼmatenti a anthu olungama mtima kuti: “Dzanja lamanja la Yehova lachita zamphamvu!

16.verse: Dzanja lamanja la Yehova latukulidwa mmwamba Dzanja lamanja la Yehova lachita zamphamvu!”

17.verse: Sindidzafa koma ndidzakhala ndi moyo ndipo ndidzalalika za ntchito ya Yehova.

18.verse: Yehova wandilanga koopsa, koma sanandipereke ku imfa.

19.verse: Tsekulireni zipata zachilungamo, kuti ndifike kudzayamika Yehova.

20.verse: Ichi ndicho chipata cha Yehova chimene olungama mtima okha adzalowerapo.

21.verse: Ndidzakuyamikani chifukwa Inu munandiyankha; mwakhala chipulumutso changa.

22.verse: Mwala umene amisiri omanga nyumba anawukana wasanduka wapangodya;

23.verse: Yehova ndiye wachita zimenezi ndipo nʼzodabwitsa pamaso pathu.

24.verse: Lero ndiye tsiku limene Yehova walipanga; tiyeni tikondwere ndi kusangalala nalo.

26.verse: Wodala amene akubwera mʼdzina la Yehova. Tikukudalitsani kuchokera ku nyumba ya Yehova.

27.verse: Yehova ndi Mulungu, ndipo kuwala kwake kwatiwunikira Ife. Lowani nawo pa mʼdipiti wa ku chikondwerero mutanyamula nthambi mʼdzanja lanu, mpaka ku nyanga za guwa.

28.verse: Inu ndinu Mulungu wanga, ndipo ndidzakuyamikani; Inu ndinu Mulungu wanga, ndipo ndidzakukwezani.

29.verse: Yamikani Yehova chifukwa ndi wabwino; pakuti chikondi chake chosasinthika ndi chosatha.

1.verse: Alefu Odala ndi amene moyo wawo ulibe cholakwa, amene amayenda monga mwa malamulo a Yehova.

2.verse: Odala ndi amene amasunga malamulo ake, amene amafunafuna Iyeyo ndi mtima wawo wonse.

3.verse: Sachita cholakwa chilichonse; amayenda mʼnjira zake.

4.verse: Inu mwapereka malangizo ndipo ayenera kutsatidwa kwathunthu.

5.verse: Aa! Ndikanakonda njira zanga zikanakhala zokhazikika pa kumvera zophunzitsa zanu!

6.verse: Pamenepo ine sindikanachititsidwa manyazi, poganizira malamulo anu onse.

7.verse: Ndidzakutamandani ndi mtima wolungama, pamene ndikuphunzira malamulo anu olungama.

8.verse: Ndidzamvera zophunzitsa zanu; musanditaye kwathunthu.

9.verse: Beti Kodi mnyamata angathe bwanji kuyeretsa mayendedwe ake? Akawasamala potsata mawu anu.

10.verse: Ndimakufunafunani ndi mtima wanga wonse; musalole kuti ndisochere kuchoka pa malamulo anu.

11.verse: Ndasunga mawu anu mu mtima mwanga kuti ndisakuchimwireni.

12.verse: Mutamandike Inu Yehova; phunzitseni malamulo anu.

13.verse: Ndi milomo yanga ndimafotokoza malamulo anu onse amene amachokera pakamwa panu.

14.verse: Ndimakondwera potsatira malamulo anu monga momwe munthu amakondwera akakhala ndi chuma chambiri.

15.verse: Ndimalingalira malangizo anu ndipo ndimaganizira njira zanu.

16.verse: Ndimakondwera ndi malamulo anu; sindidzayiwala konse mawu anu.

17.verse: Gimeli Chitirani zokoma mtumiki wanu, ndipo ndidzakhala ndi moyo; kuti tsono ndisunge mawu anu.

18.verse: Tsekulani maso anga kuti ndithe kuona zinthu zodabwitsa mʼmalamulo anu.

19.verse: Ine ndine mlendo pa dziko lapansi; musandibisire malamulo anu.

20.verse: Moyo wanga wafowoka polakalaka malamulo anu nthawi zonse.

21.verse: Inu mumadzudzula onyada, otembereredwa, amene achoka pa malamulo anu.

22.verse: Mundichotsere chitonzo ndi mnyozo pakuti ndimasunga malamulo anu.

23.verse: Ngakhale mafumu akhale pamodzi kundinyoza, mtumiki wanu adzalingalirabe zophunzitsa zanu.

24.verse: Malamulo anu amandikondweretsa; ndiwo amene amandilangiza.

25.verse: Daleti Moyo wanga wakangamira fumbi; tsitsimutseni molingana ndi mawu anu.

26.verse: Ndinafotokoza njira zanga ndipo Inu munandiyankha; phunzitseni malamulo anu.

27.verse: Mundidziwitse chiphunzitso cha malangizo anu; pamenepo ndidzalingalira zodabwitsa zanu.

28.verse: Moyo wanga wafowoka ndi chisoni; limbikitseni monga mwa mawu anu.

29.verse: Mundichotse mʼnjira zachinyengo; mundikomere mtima pondiphunzitsa malamulo anu.

30.verse: Ndasankha njira ya choonadi; ndayika malamulo anu pa mtima panga.

31.verse: Ndagwiritsitsa umboni wanu, Inu Yehova; musalole kuti ndichititsidwe manyazi.

32.verse: Ndimathamanga mʼnjira ya malamulo anu, pakuti Inu mwamasula mtima wanga.

33.verse: He Yehova, phunzitseni kutsatira zophunzitsa zanu; ndipo ndidzazisunga mpaka kumapeto.

34.verse: Mundipatse mtima womvetsa zinthu ndipo ndidzasunga malamulo anu ndi kuwamvera ndi mtima wanga wonse.

35.verse: Munditsogolere mʼnjira ya malamulo anu, pakuti mʼmenemo ndimapezamo chikondwerero changa.

36.verse: Tembenuzani mtima wanga kuti uzikonda malamulo anu, osati chuma.

37.verse: Tembenuzani maso anga kuchoka ku zinthu zachabechabe; sungani moyo wanga monga mwa mawu anu.

38.verse: Kwaniritsani lonjezo lanu kwa mtumiki wanu, kuti Inu muopedwe.

39.verse: Mundichotsere chipongwe chimene ndikuchiopa, pakuti malamulo anu ndi abwino.

40.verse: Taonani, ndimalakalakatu malangizo anu! Sungani moyo wanga mʼchilungamo chanu.

41.verse: Wawi Chikondi chanu chosasinthika chibwere kwa ine, Inu Yehova, chipulumutso chanu monga mwa lonjezo lanu;

42.verse: ndipo ndidzayankha amene amandinyoza, popeza ndimadalira mawu anu.

43.verse: Musakwatule mawu a choonadi mʼkamwa mwanga, pakuti ndakhazikitsa chiyembekezo changa mʼmalamulo anu.

44.verse: Ndidzasunga malamulo anu nthawi zonse, ku nthawi za nthawi.

45.verse: Ndidzayendayenda mwaufulu, chifukwa ndinafunafuna malangizo anu.

46.verse: Ndidzayankhula za umboni wanu pamaso pa mfumu ndipo sindidzachititsidwa manyazi,

47.verse: popeza ndimakondwera ndi malamulo anu chifukwa ndimawakonda.

48.verse: Ndikweza manja anga ku malamulo anu, ku malamulo amene ndimawakonda, ndipo ndimalingalira malangizo anu.

49.verse: Zayini Kumbukirani mawu anu kwa mtumiki wanu, popeza mwandipatsa chiyembekezo.

50.verse: Chitonthozo changa pa masautso anga ndi ichi: lonjezo lanu limasunga moyo wanga.

51.verse: Odzikuza amandinyoza popanda chowaletsa, koma sindichoka pa malamulo anu.

52.verse: Ndimakumbukira malamulo anu Yehova akalekale, ndipo mwa iwo ndimapeza chitonthozo.

53.verse: Ndayipidwa kwambiri chifukwa cha oyipa amene ataya malamulo anu.

54.verse: Zophunzitsa zanu ndi mitu ya nyimbo yanga kulikonse kumene ndigonako.

55.verse: Usiku ndimakumbukira dzina lanu Yehova, ndipo ndidzasunga malamulo anu.

56.verse: Ichi ndicho ndakhala ndikuchita: ndimasunga malangizo anu.

57.verse: Heti Yehova, Inu ndiye gawo langa; ndalonjeza kumvera mawu anu.

58.verse: Ndimafunafuna nkhope yanu ndi mtima wanga wonse; mundikomere mtima monga mwa lonjezo lanu.

59.verse: Ndinalingalira za njira zanga ndipo ndatembenuza mayendedwe anga kutsatira umboni wanu.

60.verse: Ndidzafulumira ndipo sindidzazengereza kumvera malamulo anu.

61.verse: Ngakhale oyipa andimange ndi zingwe, sindidzayiwala lamulo lanu.

62.verse: Ndimadzuka pakati pa usiku kuyamika Inu chifukwa cha malamulo anu olungama.

63.verse: Ine ndine bwenzi la onse amene amakukondani, kwa onse amene amatsatira malangizo anu.

64.verse: Dziko lapansi ladzaza ndi chikondi chanu chosasinthika, phunzitseni malamulo anu.

65.verse: Teti Inu Yehova, chitirani chabwino mtumiki wanu molingana ndi mawu anu.

66.verse: Phunzitseni nzeru ndi chiweruzo chabwino, pakuti ndimakhulupirira malamulo anu.

67.verse: Ndisanayambe kuzunzika ndinasochera, koma tsopano ndimamvera mawu anu.

68.verse: Inu ndinu abwino ndipo zimene mumachita ndi zabwino; phunzitseni malamulo anu.

69.verse: Ngakhale odzikuza andipaka mabodza, ine ndimasunga malangizo anu ndi mtima wanga wonse.

70.verse: Mitima yawo ndi yowuma ndi yosakhudzidwa, koma ine ndimakondwera ndi malamulo anu.

71.verse: Ndi bwino kuti ndinasautsidwa kuti ndithe kuphunzira malamulo anu.

72.verse: Lamulo lochokera mʼkamwa mwanu limandikomera kwambiri kuposa ndalama zambirimbiri za siliva ndi golide.

73.verse: Yodi Manja anu anandilenga ndi kundiwumba; patseni nzeru zomvetsa zinthu kuti ndiphunzire malamulo anu.

74.verse: Iwo amene amakuopani akondwere akandiona, chifukwa chiyembekezo changa chili mʼmawu anu.

75.verse: Ine ndikudziwa, Inu Yehova, kuti malamulo anu ndi olungama ndipo mwandizunza chifukwa cha kukhulupirika kwanu.

76.verse: Chikondi chanu chosasinthika chikhale chitonthozo changa, molingana ndi lonjezo lanu kwa mtumiki wanu.

77.verse: Chifundo chanu chindifikire kuti ndikhale ndi moyo, popeza malamulo anu ndiye chikondwerero changa.

78.verse: Odzikuza achititsidwe manyazi chifukwa cha kundilakwira popanda chifukwa; koma ine ndidzalingalira malangizo anu.

79.verse: Iwo amene amakuopani atembenukire kwa ine, iwo amene amamvetsetsa umboni wanu.

80.verse: Mtima wanga ukhale wopanda cholakwa pa chiphunzitso chanu kuti ndisachititsidwe manyazi.

81.verse: Kafu Moyo wanga wafowoka ndi kufunafuna chipulumutso chanu, koma chiyembekezo changa chili mʼmawu anu.

82.verse: Maso anga alefuka pofunafuna lonjezo lanu; Ine ndikuti, “Kodi mudzanditonthoza liti?”

83.verse: Ngakhale ndili ngati thumba lachikopa la vinyo pa utsi sindiyiwala zophunzitsa zanu.

84.verse: Kodi mtumiki wanu ayenera kudikira mpaka liti? Kodi mudzawalanga liti amene amandizunza?

85.verse: Anthu osalabadira za Mulungu, odzikuza amandikumbira dzenje motsutsana ndi malamulo anu.

86.verse: Malamulo anu onse ndi odalirika; thandizeni, pakuti anthu akundizunza popanda chifukwa.

87.verse: Iwo anatsala pangʼono kundichotsa pa dziko lapansi koma sindinataye malangizo anu.

88.verse: Sungani moyo wanga molingana ndi chikondi chanu chosasinthika, ndipo ndidzamvera umboni wa pakamwa panu.

89.verse: Lamedi Mawu anu Yehova ndi amuyaya; akhazikika kumwambako.

90.verse: Kukhulupirika kwanu kumakhala mpaka ku mibado yonse; Inu munakhazikitsa dziko lapansi ndipo lilipobe.

91.verse: Malamulo anu alipobe mpaka lero lino, pakuti zinthu zonse zimatumikira Inu.

92.verse: Malamulo anu akanapanda kukhala chikondwerero changa, ndikanawonongeka mʼmasautso anga.

93.verse: Ine sindidzayiwala konse malangizo anu, pakuti ndi malangizo anuwo munasunga moyo wanga.

94.verse: Ndine wanu, ndipulumutseni; pakuti ndasamala malangizo anu.

95.verse: Anthu oyipa akudikira kuti andiwononge, koma ndidzalingalira umboni wanu.

96.verse: Ndadziwa kuti zinthu zonse zili ndi malire, koma malamulo anu alibe malire konse.

97.verse: Memu Ndithu, ine ndimakonda malamulo anu! Ndimalingaliramo tsiku lonse.

98.verse: Malamulo anu amachititsa kuti ndikhale wanzeru kuposa adani anga, popeza malamulowo ali ndi ine nthawi zonse.

99.verse: Ndimamvetsa zinthu kwambiri kuposa aphunzitsi anga onse popeza ndimalingalira umboni wanu.

100.verse: Ndili ndi nzeru zochuluka zomvetsera zinthu kuposa anthu okalamba, popeza ndimamvera malangizo anu.

101.verse: Ndimaletsa miyendo yanga kuyenda mʼnjira iliyonse yoyipa kuti ndithe kumvera mawu anu.

102.verse: Sindinapatuke kuchoka pa malamulo anu, pakuti Inu mwini munandiphunzitsa.

103.verse: Mawu anu ndi otsekemera ndikawalawa, otsekemera kuposa uchi mʼkamwa mwanga!

104.verse: Ndimapeza nzeru zodziwira zinthu kuchokera mʼmalangizo anu; kotero ndimadana ndi njira iliyonse yoyipa.

105.verse: Nuni Mawu anu ndi nyale ya kumapazi kwanga ndi kuwunika kwa pa njira yanga.

106.verse: Ndalumbira ndipo ndatsimikiza, kuti ndidzatsatira malamulo anu olungama.

107.verse: Ndazunzika kwambiri; Inu Yehova, sungani moyo wanga molingana ndi mawu anu.

108.verse: Inu Yehova, landirani matamando aufulu ochokera pakamwa panga, ndipo ndiphunzitseni malamulo anu.

109.verse: Ngakhale moyo wanga umakhala mʼzoopsa nthawi ndi nthawi, sindidzayiwala malamulo anu.

110.verse: Anthu oyipa anditchera msampha, koma sindinasochere kuchoka pa malangizo anu.

111.verse: Umboni wanu ndiye cholowa changa kwamuyaya; Iwo ndiye chimwemwe cha mtima wanga.

112.verse: Mtima wanga wakhazikika pa kusunga zophunzitsa zanu mpaka kumapeto kwenikweni.

113.verse: Samekhi Ndimadana ndi anthu apawiripawiri, koma ndimakonda malamulo anu.

114.verse: Inu ndinu pothawirapo panga ndi chishango changa; chiyembekezo changa chili mʼmawu anu.

115.verse: Chokani kwa ine, inu anthu ochita zoyipa, kuti ndisunge malamulo a Mulungu wanga!

116.verse: Mundichirikize molingana ndi lonjezo lanu, ndipo ndidzakhala ndi moyo; musalole kuti chiyembekezo changa chipite pachabe.

117.verse: Gwirizizeni, ndipo ndidzapulumutsidwa; nthawi zonse ndidzasamalira zophunzitsa zanu.

118.verse: Inu mumakana onse amene amasochera kuchoka pa zophunzitsa zanu, pakuti chinyengo chawo ndi chopanda phindu.

119.verse: Anthu onse oyipa a pa dziko lapansi mumawayesa ngati zinthu zakudzala; nʼchifukwa chake ndimakonda umboni wanu.

120.verse: Thupi langa limanjenjemera chifukwa cha kuopa Inu; ndimachita mantha ndi malamulo anu.

121.verse: Ayini Ndachita zolungama ndi zabwino; musandisiye mʼmanja mwa ondizunza.

122.verse: Onetsetsani kuti mtumiki wanu akukhala bwino, musalole kuti anthu odzikuza andipondereze.

123.verse: Maso anga alefuka, kufunafuna chipulumutso chanu, kufunafuna lonjezo lanu lolungama.

124.verse: Muchite naye mtumiki wanu molingana ndi chikondi chanu chosasinthika, ndipo mundiphunzitse malamulo anu.

125.verse: Ine ndine mtumiki wanu; patseni mzimu wondizindikiritsa, kuti ndimvetsetse umboni wanu.

126.verse: Yehova, ndi nthawi yoti muchitepo kanthu; malamulo anu akuswedwa.

127.verse: Chifukwa choti ndimakonda malamulo anu kuposa golide, kuposa golide woyengeka bwino,

128.verse: ndiponso chifukwa choti ndimaona kuti malangizo anu onse ndi wowongoka, ndimadana ndi njira iliyonse yoyipa.

129.verse: Pe Maumboni anu ndi odabwitsa nʼchifukwa chake ndimawamvera.

130.verse: Mawu anu akamaphunzitsidwa amapereka kuwunika; ngakhale anthu wamba amamvetsetsa.

131.verse: Ndimatsekula pakamwa panga ndi kupuma wefuwefu, kufunafuna malamulo anu.

132.verse: Tembenukirani kwa ine ndipo mundichitire chifundo, monga mumachitira nthawi zonse kwa iwo amene amakonda dzina lanu.

133.verse: Tsogolerani mayendedwe anga molingana ndi mawu anu; musalole kuti tchimo lizindilamulira.

134.verse: Ndiwomboleni mʼdzanja la anthu ondizunza, kuti ndithe kumvera malangizo anu.

135.verse: Nkhope yanu iwalire mtumiki wanu ndipo mundiphunzitse malamulo anu.

136.verse: Mitsinje ya misozi ikuyenda kuchoka mʼmaso mwanga, chifukwa anthu sakumvera malamulo anu.

137.verse: Tsade Yehova ndinu wolungama, ndipo malamulo anu ndi abwino.

138.verse: Maumboni amene munatipatsa ndi olungama; ndi odalirika ndithu.

139.verse: Ndikusautsidwa kwambiri mʼkati mwanga chifukwa adani anu amanyalanyaza mawu anu.

140.verse: Mawu anu ndi woyera kwambiri nʼchifukwa chake mtumiki wanune ndimawakonda.

141.verse: Ngakhale ndili wamngʼono ndi wonyozeka, sindiyiwala malangizo anu.

142.verse: Chilungamo chanu nʼchamuyaya, ndipo malamulo anu nʼchoona.

143.verse: Mavuto ndi masautso zandigwera, koma ndimakondwera ndi malamulo anu.

144.verse: Umboni wanu ndi wabwino nthawi zonse; patseni nzeru zomvetsa zinthu kuti ine ndikhale ndi moyo.

145.verse: Kofu Ndimayitana ndi mtima wanga wonse; ndiyankheni Inu Yehova, ndipo ndidzamvera zophunzitsa zanu.

146.verse: Ndikuyitana kwa Inu; pulumutseni ndipo ndidzasunga umboni wanu.

147.verse: Ndimadzuka tambala asanalire kuti ndipemphe thandizo; chiyembekezo changa chili mʼmawu anu.

148.verse: Maso anga amakhala chipenyere nthawi yonse ya usiku, kuti ndithe kulingalira malonjezo anu.

149.verse: Imvani mawu anga molingana ndi chikondi chanu chosasinthika; Yehova sungani moyo wanga, molingana ndi malamulo anu.

150.verse: Iwo amene amakonza njira zoyipa andiyandikira, koma ali kutali ndi malamulo anu.

151.verse: Koma Inu Yehova muli pafupi, malamulo anu onse ndi woona.

152.verse: Ndinaphunzira kalekale kuchokera mʼmaumboni anu kuti maumboni amene munakhazikitsawo ndi amuyaya.

153.verse: Reshi Yangʼanani masautso anga ndipo mundipulumutse, pakuti sindinayiwale malamulo anu.

154.verse: Mundiyimirire pa mlandu wanga ndi kundiwombola; sungani moyo wanga molingana ndi lonjezo lanu.

155.verse: Chipulumutso chili kutali ndi anthu oyipa, pakuti iwowo safunafuna zophunzitsa zanu.

156.verse: Chifundo chanu Yehova nʼchachikulu; sungani moyo wanga molingana ndi malamulo anu.

157.verse: Adani amene akundizunza ndi ambiri, koma ine sindinatembenuke kuchoka pa umboni wanu.

158.verse: Ndimawayangʼana monyansidwa anthu opanda chikhulupiriro, popeza samvera mawu anu.

159.verse: Onani momwe ndimakondera malangizo anu; sungani moyo wanga, Inu Yehova, molingana ndi chikondi chanu chosanthika.

160.verse: Mawu anu onse ndi owona; malamulo anu onse olungama ndi amuyaya.

161.verse: Sini ndi Shini Olamulira amandizunza popanda chifukwa, koma mtima wanga umanjenjemera ndi mawu anu.

162.verse: Ine ndimakondwa ndi lonjezo lanu, ngati munthu amene wapeza chuma chambiri.

163.verse: Ndimadana ndi chinyengo, kwambiri ndimanyansidwa nacho, koma ndimakonda malamulo anu.

164.verse: Ndimakutamandani kasanu ndi kawiri pa tsiku pakuti malamulo anu ndi olungama.

165.verse: Amene amakonda malamulo anu ali ndi mtendere waukulu, ndipo palibe chimene chingawapunthwitse

166.verse: Ndikudikira chipulumutso chanu, Inu Yehova, ndipo ndimatsatira malamulo anu.

167.verse: Ndimamvera umboni wanu pakuti ndimawukonda kwambiri.

168.verse: Ndimamvera malangizo anu ndi umboni wanu, pakuti njira zanga zonse ndi zodziwika pamaso panu.

169.verse: Tawu Kulira kwanga kufike pamaso panu Yehova; patseni nzeru zomvetsa zinthu molingana ndi mawu anu.

170.verse: Kupempha kwanga kufike pamaso panu; pulumutseni molingana ndi lonjezo lanu.

171.verse: Matamando asefukire pa milomo yanga, pakuti Inu mumandiphunzitsa malamulo anu.

172.verse: Lilime langa liyimbe mawu anu, popeza malamulo anu onse ndi olungama.

173.verse: Dzanja lanu likhale lokonzeka kundithandiza pakuti ndasankha malangizo anu.

174.verse: Ndikufunitsitsa chipulumutso chanu Yehova, ndipo ndimakondwera ndi malamulo anu.

175.verse: Loleni kuti ndikhale ndi moyo kuti ndikutamandeni, ndipo malamulo anu andichirikize.

176.verse: Ndasochera ngati nkhosa yotayika, funafunani mtumiki wanu, pakuti sindinayiwale malamulo anu.

1.verse: Nyimbo yoyimba pokwera ku Yerusalemu. Ndimafuwulira kwa Yehova mʼmasautso anga, ndipo Iye amandiyankha.

2.verse: Pulumutseni Yehova ku milomo yabodza, ndi kwa anthu achinyengo.

3.verse: Kodi adzakuchitani chiyani, ndipo adzawonjezerapo zotani, inu anthu achinyengo?

4.verse: Adzakulangani ndi mivi yakuthwa ya munthu wankhondo, ndi makala oyaka a mtengo wa tsanya.

5.verse: Tsoka ine kuti ndimakhala ku Mesaki, kuti ndimakhala pakati pa matenti a ku Kedara!

6.verse: Kwa nthawi yayitali ndakhala pakati pa iwo amene amadana ndi mtendere.

7.verse: Ine ndine munthu wamtendere; koma ndikamayankhula, iwo amafuna nkhondo.

1.verse: Nyimbo yoyimba pokwera ku Yerusalemu. Ndikweza maso anga ku mapiri; kodi thandizo langa limachokera kuti?

2.verse: Thandizo langa limachokera kwa Yehova, wolenga kumwamba ndi dziko lapansi.

3.verse: Sadzalola kuti phazi lako literereke; Iye amene amakusunga sadzawodzera.

4.verse: Taonani, Iye amene amasunga Israeli sadzawodzera kapena kugona.

5.verse: Yehova ndiye amene amakusunga; Yehova ndiye mthunzi wako ku dzanja lako lamanja.

6.verse: Dzuwa silidzakupweteka nthawi ya masana, kapena mwezi nthawi ya usiku.

7.verse: Yehova adzakuteteza ku zoyipa zonse; adzasunga moyo wako.

8.verse: Yehova adzayangʼanira kutuluka kwako ndi kulowa kwako; kuyambira tsopano mpaka muyaya.

1.verse: Salimo la Davide. Nyimbo yoyimba pokwera ku Yerusalemu. Ndinakondwera atandiwuza kuti, “Tiyeni ku nyumba ya Yehova.”

2.verse: Mapazi athu akuyima mʼzipata zako, Iwe Yerusalemu.

3.verse: Yerusalemu anamangidwa ngati mzinda umene uli wothithikana pamodzi.

4.verse: Kumeneko ndiye kumene kumapita mafuko, mafuko a Yehova, umboni wa kwa Israeli, kuti atamande dzina la Yehova.

5.verse: Kumeneko anayikako mipando yaufumu yachiweruzo, mipando yaufumu ya nyumba ya Davide.

6.verse: Pemphererani mtendere wa Yerusalemu: “Iwo amene amakukonda iwe zinthu ziwayendere bwino.

7.verse: Mukhale mtendere mʼkati mwa makoma ako, ndipo mʼnyumba zako zaufumu mukhale chitetezo.”

8.verse: Chifukwa cha abale anga ndi abwenzi anga ndidzati, “Mtendere ukhale mʼkati mwako.”

9.verse: Chifukwa cha Nyumba ya Yehova Mulungu wathu, ndidzakufunira zabwino.

1.verse: Nyimbo yoyimba pokwera ku Yerusalemu. Ndikweza maso anga kwa Inu, kwa Inu amene mumakhala kumwamba.

2.verse: Taonani, monga momwe maso a akapolo amayangʼana mʼdzanja la mbuye wawo, monga momwenso maso a mdzakazi amayangʼana mʼdzanja la dona wake, choncho maso athu ali kwa Yehova Mulungu wathu, mpaka atichitire chifundo.

3.verse: Mutichitire chifundo, Inu Yehova mutichitire chifundo, pakuti tapirira chitonzo chachikulu.

4.verse: Ife tapirira mnyozo wambiri kuchokera kwa anthu odzikuza, chitonzo chachikulu kuchokera kwa anthu onyada.

1.verse: Salimo la Davide. Nyimbo yoyimba pokwera ku Yerusalemu. Akanapanda kukhala mbali yathu Yehova, anene tsono Israeli,

2.verse: akanapanda kukhala mbali yathu Yehova, potiwukira anthuwo,

3.verse: iwo atatipsera mtima, akanatimeza amoyo;

4.verse: chigumula chikanatimiza, mtsinje ukanatikokolola,

5.verse: madzi a mkokomo akanatikokolola.

6.verse: Atamandike Yehova, amene sanalole kuti tikhale chakudya cha mano awo.

7.verse: Moyo wathu wawonjoka ngati mbalame yokodwa mu msampha wa mlenje; msampha wathyoka, ndipo ife tapulumuka.

8.verse: Thandizo lathu lili mʼdzina la Yehova wolenga kumwamba ndi dziko lapansi.

1.verse: Nyimbo yoyimba pokwera ku Yerusalemu. Amene amadalira Yehova ali ngati phiri la Ziyoni, limene silingagwedezeke koma ndi lokhala mpaka muyaya.

2.verse: Monga mapiri azungulira Yerusalemu, momwemonso Yehova azungulira anthu ake kuyambira tsopano mpaka muyaya.

3.verse: Ndodo yaufumu ya anthu oyipa sidzakhala pa dziko limene lapatsidwa kwa anthu olungama, kuti anthu olungamawo angachite nawonso zoyipa.

4.verse: Yehova chitirani zabwino amene ndi abwino, amene ndi olungama mtima

5.verse: Koma amene amatembenukira ku njira zokhotakhota, Yehova adzawachotsa pamodzi ndi anthu ochita zoyipa. Mtendere ukhale pa Israeli.

1.verse: Nyimbo yoyimba pokwera ku Yerusalemu. Yehova atabwezera akapolo ku Ziyoni, tinali ngati amene akulota.

2.verse: Pakamwa pathu panadzaza ndi kuseka; malilime athu ndi nyimbo zachimwemwe. Pamenepo kunanenedwa pakati pa anthu kuti, “Yehova wawachitira zinthu zazikulu.”

3.verse: Yehova watichitira zinthu zazikulu, ndipo tadzazidwa ndi chimwemwe.

4.verse: Tibwezereni madalitso athu, Inu Yehova, monga mitsinje ya ku Negevi.

5.verse: Iwo amene amafesa akulira, adzakolola akuyimba nyimbo zachimwemwe.

6.verse: Iye amene amayendayenda nalira, atanyamula mbewu yokafesa, adzabwerera akuyimba nyimbo zachimwemwe, atanyamula mitolo yake.

1.verse: Nyimbo yoyimba pokwera ku Yerusalemu. Salimo la Solomoni. Yehova akapanda kumanga nyumba, omanga nyumbayo agwira ntchito pachabe. Yehova akapanda kulondera mzinda, mlonda akanangolondera pachabe.

2.verse: Mumangodzivuta nʼkulawirira mmamawa ndi kusagona msanga madzulo, kuvutikira chakudya choti mudye, pakuti Iye amapereka tulo kwa amene amawakonda.

3.verse: Ana ndiye cholowa chochokera kwa Yehova, ana ndi mphotho yochokera kwa Iye.

4.verse: Ana a pa unyamata ali ngati mivi mʼmanja mwa munthu wankhondo.

5.verse: Wodala munthu amene motengera mivi mwake mwadzaza. Iwo sadzachititsidwa manyazi pamene alimbana ndi adani awo pa zipata.

1.verse: Nyimbo yoyimba pokwera ku Yerusalemu. Odala ndi onse amene amaopa Yehova, amene amayenda mʼnjira zake.

2.verse: Udzadya chipatso cha ntchito yako; madalitso ndi chuma zidzakhala zako.

3.verse: Mkazi wako adzakhala ngati mpesa wobereka mʼkati mwa nyumba yako; ana ako adzakhala ngati mphukira za mitengo ya olivi kuzungulira tebulo lako.

4.verse: Ameneyu ndiye munthu wodalitsidwa amene amaopa Yehova.

5.verse: Yehova akudalitse kuchokera mʼZiyoni masiku onse a moyo wako; uwone zokoma za Yerusalemu,

6.verse: ndipo ukhale ndi moyo kuti udzaone zidzukulu zako. Mtendere ukhale ndi Israeli.
