1.verse: Nyimbo yoyimba pokwera ku Yerusalemu. “Andizunza kwambiri kuyambira ubwana wanga,” anene tsono Israeli;

2.verse: “Andizunza kwambiri kuyambira ubwana wanga, koma sanandipambane.

3.verse: Anthu otipula analima pa msana panga ndipo anapangapo mizere yayitali:

4.verse: Koma Yehova ndi wolungama; Iye wandimasula ku zingwe za anthu oyipa.”

5.verse: Onse amene amadana ndi Ziyoni abwezedwe pambuyo mwamanyazi.

6.verse: Akhale ngati udzu womera pa denga la nyumba, umene umafota usanakule;

7.verse: sungadzaze manja a owumweta kapena manja a omanga mitolo.

8.verse: Odutsa pafupi asanene kuti, “Dalitso la Yehova lili pa inu; tikukudalitsani mʼdzina la Yehova.”

1.verse: Nyimbo yoyimba pokwera ku Yerusalemu. Ndikulirira kwa Inu Yehova ndili mʼdzenje lozama;

2.verse: Ambuye imvani mawu anga. Makutu anu akhale tcheru kumva kupempha chifundo kwanga.

3.verse: Inu Yehova, mukanamawerengera machimo, Inu Yehova, akanayima chilili ndani wopanda mlandu?

4.verse: Koma kwa Inu kuli chikhululukiro; nʼchifukwa chake mumaopedwa.

5.verse: Ndimayembekezera Yehova, moyo wanga umayembekezera, ndipo ndimakhulupirira mawu ake.

6.verse: Moyo wanga umayembekezera Ambuye, kupambana momwe alonda amayembekezera mmawa, inde, kupambana momwe alonda amayembekezera mmawa,

7.verse: Yembekeza Yehova, iwe Israeli, pakuti Yehova ali ndi chikondi chosasinthika ndipo alinso ndi chipulumutso chochuluka.

8.verse: Iye mwini adzawombola Israeli ku machimo ake onse.

1.verse: Nyimbo yoyimba pokwera ku Yerusalemu. Salimo la Davide. Inu Yehova, mtima wanga siwodzikuza, maso anga siwonyada; sinditengeteka mtima ndi zinthu zapamwamba ndi zodabwitsa.

2.verse: Koma moyo wanga ndawutontholetsa ndi kuwukhalitsa chete ngati mwana amene amayi ake amuletsa kuyamwa, moyo wanga mʼkati mwanga uli ngati mwana amene amuletsa kuyamwa.

3.verse: Yembekeza Yehova, iwe Israeli, kuyambira tsopano mpaka muyaya.

1.verse: Nyimbo yoyimba pokwera ku Yerusalemu. Inu Yehova, kumbukirani Davide ndi mavuto onse anapirira.

2.verse: Iye analumbira kwa Yehova ndi kulonjeza kwa Wamphamvu wa Yakobo kuti,

3.verse: “Sindidzalowa mʼnyumba mwanga kapena kugona pa bedi langa:

4.verse: sindidzalola kuti maso anga agone, kapena zikope zanga ziwodzere,

5.verse: mpaka nditamupezera malo Yehova, malo okhala a Wamphamvu wa Yakobo.”

6.verse: Zoonadi, tinamva za Bokosi la Chipangano ku Efurata, tinalipeza mʼminda ya ku Yaara:

7.verse: “Tiyeni tipite ku malo ake okhalamo; tiyeni tikamulambire pa mapazi ake.

8.verse: ‘Dzukani Yehova, ndipo bwerani ku malo anu opumulira, Inuyo ndi Bokosi la Chipangano limene limafanizira mphamvu zanu.

9.verse: Ansembe anu avekedwe chilungamo; anthu anu oyera mtima ayimbe nyimbo mwachimwemwe.’ ”

10.verse: Chifukwa cha Davide mtumiki wanu, musakane wodzozedwa wanu.

11.verse: Yehova analumbira kwa Davide, lumbiro lotsimikizika kuti Iye sadzasintha: “Mmodzi wa ana ako ndidzamuyika pa mpando waufumu;

12.verse: ngati ana ako azisunga pangano langa ndi malamulo amene ndiwaphunzitsa, pamenepo ana awo adzakhala pa mpando wako waufumu kwamuyaya ndi muyaya.”

13.verse: Pakuti Yehova wasankha Ziyoni, Iye wakhumba kuti akhale malo ake okhalamo:

14.verse: “Awa ndi malo anga opumapo ku nthawi za nthawi; ndidzakhala pano pa mpando waufumu, pakuti ndakhumba zimenezi.

15.verse: Ndidzadalitsa mzindawu ndi zinthu zambiri; anthu ake osauka ndidzawakhutitsa ndi chakudya.

16.verse: Ndidzaveka ansembe ake chipulumutso, ndipo anthu ake oyera mtima adzayimba nthawi zonse nyimbo zachimwemwe.

17.verse: “Pano ndidzachulukitsa mphamvu za Davide ndi kuyikapo nyale ya wodzozedwa wanga.

18.verse: Ndidzaveka adani ake manyazi, koma chipewa chaufumu pamutu pake chidzakhala chowala.”

1.verse: Salimo la Davide. Nyimbo yoyimba pokwera ku Yerusalemu. Onani, nʼkokoma ndi kokondweretsa ndithu pamene abale akhala pamodzi mwachiyanjano!

2.verse: Zili ngati mafuta amtengowapatali othiridwa pa mutu, otsikira ku ndevu, ku ndevu za Aaroni, oyenderera mpaka mʼkhosi mwa mkanjo wake.

3.verse: Zili ngati mame a ku Heremoni otsikira pa Phiri la Ziyoni. Pakuti pamenepo Yehova amaperekapo dalitso, ndiwo moyo wamuyaya.

1.verse: Nyimbo yoyimba pokwera ku Yerusalemu. Bwerani, mutamande Yehova, inu atumiki onse a Yehova, amene mumatumikira usiku mʼnyumba ya Yehova.

2.verse: Kwezani manja anu mʼmalo opatulika ndipo mutamande Yehova.

3.verse: Yehova wolenga kumwamba ndi dziko lapansi, akudalitseni kuchokera mʼZiyoni.

1.verse: Tamandani Yehova. Tamandani dzina la Yehova; mutamandeni, inu atumiki a Yehova,

2.verse: amene mumatumikira mʼnyumba ya Yehova, mʼmabwalo a nyumba ya Mulungu wathu.

3.verse: Tamandani Yehova, pakuti Yehova ndi wabwino; imbani nyimbo zotamanda dzina lake, pakuti nʼkokoma kutero,

4.verse: Pakuti Yehova wasankha Yakobo kuti akhale wake, Israeli kuti akhale chuma chake chapamtima.

5.verse: Ndikudziwa kuti Yehova ndi wamkulu, kuti Ambuye athu ndi wamkulu kuposa milungu yonse.

6.verse: Yehova amachita chilichonse chimene chimamukomera, kumwamba ndi dziko lapansi, ku nyanja zazikulu ndi ku malo ake onse akuya.

7.verse: Iye amatulutsa mitambo kuchokera ku malekezero a dziko lapansi, amatumiza zingʼaningʼani pamodzi ndi mvula ndipo amatulutsa mphepo ku malo ake osungiramo.

8.verse: Anakantha ana oyamba kubadwa a Igupto, ana oyamba kubadwa a anthu ndi nyama.

9.verse: Iye anatumiza zizindikiro zozizwitsa ndi zodabwitsa pakati pako, iwe Igupto, kutsutsana ndi Farao pamodzi ndi atumiki ake onse.

10.verse: Iye anakantha mitundu yambiri ya anthu ndi kupha mafumu amphamvu:

11.verse: Sihoni mfumu ya Aamori, Ogi mfumu ya Basani, ndi maufumu onse a ku Kanaani;

12.verse: ndipo anapereka dziko lawo ngati cholowa, cholowa cha anthu ake Aisraeli.

13.verse: Dzina lanu, Inu Yehova, ndi losatha mpaka muyaya, mbiri yanu, Inu Yehova, idziwika mibado yonse.

14.verse: Pakuti Yehova adzaonetsa kuti anthu ake ngosalakwa, ndipo adzachitira chifundo atumiki ake.

15.verse: Mafano a mitundu ya anthu ndi siliva ndi golide, opangidwa ndi manja a anthu.

16.verse: Pakamwa ali napo koma sayankhula maso ali nawo, koma sapenya;

17.verse: makutu ali nawo, koma sakumva ndipo mʼkamwa mwawo mulibe mpweya uliwonse.

18.verse: Iwo amene amapanga mafanowo adzakhala ngati mafanowo, chimodzimodzinso iwo amene amadalira mafanowo.

19.verse: Inu nyumba ya Israeli, tamandani Yehova; inu nyumba ya Aaroni, tamandani Yehova;

20.verse: Inu nyumba ya Levi, tamandani Yehova; Inu amene mumaopa Iye, tamandani Yehova.

21.verse: Wodalitsika ndi Yehova kuchokera mʼZiyoni, amene amakhala mu Yerusalemu. Tamandani Yehova.

1.verse: Yamikani Yehova chifukwa ndi wabwino. Pakuti chikondi chake chosasinthika nʼchamuyaya.

2.verse: Yamikani Mulungu wa milungu. Pakuti chikondi chake chosasinthika nʼchamuyaya.

3.verse: Yamikani Ambuye wa ambuye, pakuti chikondi chake chosasinthika nʼchamuyaya.

4.verse: Iye yekhayo amene amachita zodabwitsa zazikulu, pakuti chikondi chake chosasinthika nʼchamuyaya.

5.verse: Amene mwachidziwitso chake anapanga mayiko akumwamba, pakuti chikondi chake chosasinthika nʼchamuyaya.

6.verse: Amene anayala dziko lapansi pamwamba pa madzi, pakuti chikondi chake chosasinthika nʼchamuyaya.

7.verse: Amene anapanga miyuni ikuluikulu, pakuti chikondi chake chosasinthika nʼchamuyaya.

8.verse: Dzuwa lilamulire usana, pakuti chikondi chake chosasinthika nʼchamuyaya.

9.verse: Mwezi ndi nyenyezi zilamulire usiku, pakuti chikondi chake chosasinthika nʼchamuyaya.

10.verse: Amene anakantha ana woyamba kubadwa a Igupto, pakuti chikondi chake chosasinthika nʼchamuyaya.

11.verse: Natulutsa Israeli pakati pawo, pakuti chikondi chake chosasinthika nʼchamuyaya.

12.verse: Ndi dzanja lamphamvu ndi mkono wotambasuka, pakuti chikondi chake chosasinthika nʼchamuyaya.

13.verse: Amene anagawa Nyanja Yofiira pakati, pakuti chikondi chake chosasinthika nʼchamuyaya.

14.verse: Nadutsitsa Israeli pakati pa nyanjayo, pakuti chikondi chake chosasinthika nʼchamuyaya.

15.verse: Koma anakokolola Farao ndi ankhondo ake mʼNyanja Yofiira, pakuti chikondi chake chosasinthika nʼchamuyaya.

16.verse: Amene anatsogolera anthu ake mʼchipululu pakuti chikondi chake chosasinthika nʼchamuyaya.

17.verse: Amene anakantha mafumu akuluakulu, pakuti chikondi chake chosasinthika nʼchamuyaya.

18.verse: Napha mafumu amphamvu, pakuti chikondi chake chosasinthika nʼchamuyaya.

19.verse: Siloni mfumu ya Aamori, pakuti chikondi chake chosasinthika nʼchamuyaya.

20.verse: Ogi mfumu ya Basani, pakuti chikondi chake chosasinthika nʼchamuyaya.

21.verse: Napereka dziko lawo ngati cholowa, pakuti chikondi chake chosasinthika nʼchamuyaya.

22.verse: Cholowa cha mtumiki wake Israeli; pakuti chikondi chake chosasinthika nʼchamuyaya.

23.verse: Amene anatikumbukira ife anthu opeputsidwa, pakuti chikondi chake chosasinthika nʼchamuyaya.

24.verse: Amene anatimasula kwa adani athu, pakuti chikondi chake chosasinthika nʼchamuyaya.

25.verse: Amene amapereka chakudya kwa cholengedwa chilichonse, pakuti chikondi chake chosasinthika nʼchamuyaya.

26.verse: Yamikani Mulungu wakumwamba, pakuti chikondi chake chosasinthika nʼchamuyaya.

1.verse: Mʼmbali mwa mitsinje ya ku Babuloni tinakhala pansi ndi kulira pamene tinakumbukira Ziyoni.

2.verse: Kumeneko, pa mitengo ya misondozi tinapachika apangwe athu,

3.verse: pakuti anthu otigwira ukapolo anatipempha kuti tiyimbe nyimbo. Otizunza athu anafuna nyimbo zachisangalalo; iwo anati, “Tiyimbireni imodzi mwa nyimbo za ku Ziyoni!”

4.verse: Tingayimbe bwanji nyimbo za Yehova mʼdziko lachilendo?

5.verse: Ndikakuyiwala iwe Yerusalemu, dzanja langa lamanja liyiwale luso lake.

6.verse: Lilime langa limamatire ku nkhama za mʼkamwa mwanga ndikapanda kukukumbukira iwe Yerusalemu, ngati sindiyesa iwe chimwemwe changa chachikulu.

7.verse: Kumbukirani, Inu Yehova, zimene Aedomu anachita pa tsiku limene Yerusalemu anagonja. Iwowo anafuwula kuti, “Mugwetseni pansi, mugwetseni pansi mpaka pa maziko ake!”

8.verse: Iwe mwana wa mkazi wa Babuloni, woyenera kuwonongedwa, wodalitsika ndi yemwe adzakubwezera pa zimene watichitira.

9.verse: Amene adzagwira makanda ako ndi kuwakankhanthitsa pa miyala.

1.verse: Salimo la Davide. Ndidzakuyamikani Yehova ndi mtima wanga wonse; ndidzayimba nyimbo zokutamandani pamaso pa “milungu.”

2.verse: Ndidzagwada kuyangʼana ku Nyumba yanu yoyera ndipo ndidzayamika dzina lanu chifukwa cha chikondi chanu ndi kukhulupirika kwanu, pakuti Inu mwakuza dzina lanu ndi mawu anu kupambana zinthu zonse.

3.verse: Pamene ndinayitana, munandiyankha; munandisandutsa wamphamvu ndi wolimba mtima.

4.verse: Mafumu onse a dziko lapansi akuyamikeni Yehova, pamene amva mawu a pakamwa panu.

5.verse: Iwo ayimbe za njira za Yehova, pakuti ulemerero wa Yehova ndi waukulu.

6.verse: Ngakhale kuti Yehova ngokwezeka, amasamalira odzichepetsa, koma anthu onyada amawadziwira chapatali.

7.verse: Ngakhale ndiyende pakati pa masautso, mumasunga moyo wanga; mumatambasula dzanja lanu kutsutsana ndi mkwiyo wa adani anga, mumandipulumutsa ndi dzanja lanu lamanja.

8.verse: Yehova adzakwaniritsa cholinga chake pa ine; chikondi chanu chosasinthika Yehova, ndi chosatha musasiye ntchito ya manja anu.

1.verse: Kwa mtsogoleri wa mayimbidwe. Salimo la Davide. Inu Yehova, mwandisanthula ndipo mukundidziwa.

2.verse: Inu mumadziwa pamene ndikhala pansi ndi pamene ndidzuka; mumazindikira maganizo anga muli kutali.

3.verse: Mumapenyetsetsa pamene ndikutuluka ndi kugona kwanga; mumadziwa njira zanga zonse.

4.verse: Mawu asanatuluke pa lilime langa mumawadziwa bwinobwino, Inu Yehova.

5.verse: Mumandizinga kumbuyo ndi kutsogolo komwe; mwasanjika dzanja lanu pa ine.

6.verse: Nzeru zimenezi ndi zopitirira nzeru zanga, ndi zapamwamba kuti ine ndizipeze.

7.verse: Kodi ndingapite kuti kufuna kuzemba Mzimu wanu? Kodi ndingathawire kuti kuchoka pamaso panu?

8.verse: Ndikakwera kumwamba, Inu muli komweko; ndikakagona ku malo a anthu akufa, Inu muli komweko.

9.verse: Ngati ndiwulukira kotulukira dzuwa, ngati ndikakhala ku malekezero a nyanja,

10.verse: kumenekonso dzanja lanu lidzanditsogolera, dzanja lanu lamanja lidzandigwiriziza.

11.verse: Ndikanena kuti, “Zoonadi, mdima udzandibisa ndithu ndipo kuwunika kukhale mdima mondizungulira,”

12.verse: komabe mdimawo sudzakhala mdima kwa Inu; usiku udzawala ngati masana, pakuti mdima uli ngati kuwunika kwa Inu.

13.verse: Pakuti Inu munalenga za mʼkati mwanga; munandiwumba pamodzi mʼmimba mwa amayi anga.

14.verse: Ndimakuyamikani chifukwa ndinapangidwa mochititsa mantha ndi modabwitsa; ntchito zanu ndi zodabwitsa, zimenezi ndimazidziwa bwino lomwe.

15.verse: Mapangidwe anga sanabisike pamaso panu pamene ndimapangidwa mʼmalo achinsinsi, pamene ndinkawumbidwa mwaluso mʼmimba ya amayi anga.

16.verse: Maso anu anaona thupi langa lisanawumbidwe. Masiku onse amene anapatsidwa kwa ine, analembedwa mʼbuku lanu asanayambe nʼkuwerengedwa komwe.

17.verse: Zolingalira zanu pa ine ndi zamtengowapatali, Inu Mulungu, ndi zosawerengeka ndithu!

18.verse: Ndikanaziwerenga, zikanakhala zochuluka kuposa mchenga; pamene ndadzuka, ndili nanube.

19.verse: Ndi bwino mukanangopha anthu oyipa, Inu Mulungu! Chokereni inu anthu owononga anzanu!

20.verse: Amayankhula za Inu ndi zolinga zoyipa; adani anu amagwiritsa ntchito dzina lanu molakwika.

21.verse: Kodi ine sindidana nawo amene amakudani, Inu Yehova? Kodi sindinyansidwa nawo amene amakuwukirani?

22.verse: Ndimadana nawo kwathunthu; ndi adani anga.

23.verse: Santhuleni, Inu Mulungu ndipo mudziwe mtima wanga; Yeseni ndipo mudziwe zolingalira zanga.

24.verse: Onani ngati muli mayendedwe aliwonse oyipa mwa ine, ndipo munditsogolere mʼnjira yanu yamuyaya.

1.verse: Kwa mtsogoleri wa mayimbidwe. Salimo la Davide. Landitseni Yehova kwa anthu oyipa; tetezeni kwa anthu ankhanza,

2.verse: amene mu mtima mwawo amakonza zinthu zoyipa ndi kuyambitsa nkhondo tsiku lililonse.

3.verse: Iwo amanola malilime awo kukhala akuthwa ngati a njoka; pa milomo yawo pali ululu wa mamba. Sela

4.verse: Tetezeni Inu Yehova, kwa anthu oyipa; tchinjirizeni kwa anthu ankhanza amene amakonza zokola mapazi anga.

5.verse: Anthu odzikuza anditchera msampha mobisika; iwo atchera zingwe za maukonde awo ndipo anditchera misampha pa njira yanga. Sela

6.verse: Inu Yehova, ine ndikuti, “Ndinu Mulungu wanga.” Imvani kupempha kwanga Yehova.

7.verse: Inu Ambuye Wamphamvuzonse, Mpulumutsi wanga wamphamvu, mumateteza mutu wanga tsiku lankhondo.

8.verse: Musawapatse anthu oyipa zokhumba zawo, Inu Yehova; musalole kuti zokonza zawo zitheke, mwina iwo adzayamba kunyada. Sela

9.verse: Mitu ya amene andizungulira iphimbidwe ndi masautso amene milomo yawo yayambitsa.

10.verse: Makala amoto agwere pa iwo; aponyedwe pa moto, mʼmaenje amatope, asatulukemonso.

11.verse: Musalole kuti anthu achipongwe akhazikike mʼdziko; choyipa chilondole anthu ankhanza.

12.verse: Ndikudziwa kuti Yehova amapereka chiweruzo cholungama kwa anthu osauka, ndipo amateteza zolinga za anthu osowa.

13.verse: Zoonadi anthu olungama adzatamanda dzina lanu, ndipo anthu owongoka mtima adzakhala pamaso panu.

1.verse: Salimo la Davide. Inu Yehova ndikukuyitanani; bwerani msanga kwa ine. Imvani mawu anga pamene ndiyitana Inu.

2.verse: Pemphero langa lifike kwa Inu ngati lubani; kukweza manja kwanga kukhale ngati nsembe yamadzulo.

3.verse: Yehova ikani mlonda pakamwa panga; londerani khomo la pa milomo yanga.

4.verse: Musalole kuti mtima wanga ukokedwere ku zoyipa; kuchita ntchito zonyansa pamodzi ndi anthu amene amachita zoyipa; musalole kuti ndidye nawo zokoma zawo.

5.verse: Munthu wolungama andikanthe, chimenecho ndiye chifundo; andidzudzule ndiye mafuta pa mutu wanga. Mutu wanga sudzakana zimenezi. Komabe pemphero langa nthawi zonse ndi lotsutsana ndi ntchito za anthu ochita zoyipa.

6.verse: Olamulira awo adzaponyedwa pansi kuchokera pa malo okwera kwambiri, ndipo anthu oyipa adzaphunzira kuti mawu anga anayankhulidwa bwino.

7.verse: Iwo adzati, “Monga momwe nkhuni zimamwazikira akaziwaza, ndi momwenso mafupa athu amwazikira pa khomo la manda.”

8.verse: Koma maso anga akupenyetsetsa Inu Ambuye Wamphamvuzonse; ndimathawira kwa Inu, musandipereke ku imfa.

9.verse: Mundipulumutse ku misampha imene anditchera, ku makhwekhwe amene anthu oyipa andikonzera.

10.verse: Anthu oyipa akodwe mʼmaukonde awo, mpaka ine nditadutsa mwamtendere.

1.verse: Ndakatulo ya Davide, pamene iyeyo anali mʼphanga. Pemphero. Ndikulirira Yehova mofuwula; ndikukweza mawu anga kwa Yehova kupempha chifundo.

2.verse: Ndikukhuthula madandawulo anga pamaso pake; ndikufotokoza za masautso anga pamaso pake.

3.verse: Pamene mzimu wanga walefuka mʼkati mwanga, ndinu amene mudziwa njira yanga. Mʼnjira imene ndimayendamo anthu anditchera msampha mobisa.

4.verse: Yangʼanani kumanja kwanga ndipo onani; palibe amene akukhudzika nane. Ndilibe pothawira; palibe amene amasamala za moyo wanga.

5.verse: Ndilirira Inu Yehova; ndikuti, “Ndinu pothawirapo panga, gawo langa mʼdziko la anthu amoyo.”

6.verse: Mverani kulira kwanga pakuti ndathedwa nzeru; pulumutseni kwa amene akundithamangitsa pakuti ndi amphamvu kuposa ine.

7.verse: Tulutseni mʼndende yanga kuti nditamande dzina lanu. Ndipo anthu olungama adzandizungulira chifukwa cha zabwino zanu pa ine.

1.verse: Salimo la Davide. Yehova imvani pemphero langa, mvetserani kulira kwanga kopempha chifundo; mwa kukhulupirika kwanu ndi chilungamo chanu bwerani kudzandithandiza.

2.verse: Musazenge mlandu mtumiki wanu, pakuti palibe munthu wamoyo amene ndi wolungama pamaso panu.

3.verse: Mdani akundithamangitsa, iye wandipondereza pansi; wachititsa kuti ndikhale mu mdima ngati munthu amene anafa kale.

4.verse: Choncho mzimu wanga ukufowoka mʼkati mwanga; mʼkati mwanga, mtima wanga uli ndi nkhawa.

5.verse: Ndimakumbukira masiku amakedzana; ndimalingalira za ntchito yanu yonse, ndimaganizira zimene manja anu anachita.

6.verse: Ndatambalitsa manja anga kwa Inu; moyo wanga uli ndi ludzu lofuna Inu monga nthaka yowuma. Sela

7.verse: Yehova ndiyankheni msanga; mzimu wanga ukufowoka. Musandibisire nkhope yanu, mwina ndidzakhala ngati iwo amene atsikira ku dzenje.

8.verse: Lolani kuti mmawa ubweretse mawu achikondi chanu chosasinthika, pakuti ine ndimadalira Inu. Mundisonyeze njira yoti ndiyendemo, pakuti kwa Inu nditukulira moyo wanga.

9.verse: Pulumutseni kwa adani anga, Inu Yehova, pakuti ndimabisala mwa Inu.

10.verse: Phunzitseni kuchita chifuniro chanu, popeza ndinu Mulungu wanga; Mzimu wanu wabwino unditsogolere pa njira yanu yosalala.

11.verse: Sungani moyo wanga Inu Yehova chifukwa cha dzina lanu; mwa chilungamo chanu tulutseni mʼmasautso anga.

12.verse: Mwa chikondi chanu chosasinthika khalitsani chete adani anga; wonongani adani anga, pakuti ndine mtumiki wanu.

1.verse: Salimo la Davide. Atamandike Yehova Thanthwe langa, amene amaphunzitsa manja anga kuchita nkhondo; zala zanga kumenya nkhondo.

2.verse: Iye ndiye Mulungu wanga wachikondi ndi malo anga otetezedwa, linga langa ndi mpulumutsi wanga, chishango changa mmene ine ndimathawiramo, amene amagonjetsa mitundu ya anthu pansi panga.

3.verse: Inu Yehova, munthu nʼchiyani kuti mumamusamalira, mwana wa munthu kuti muzimuganizira?

4.verse: Munthu ali ngati mpweya; masiku ake ali ngati mthunzi wosakhalitsa.

5.verse: Ngʼambani mayiko akumwamba, Inu Yehova, ndipo tsikani pansi; khudzani mapiri kuti atulutse utsi.

6.verse: Tumizani zingʼaningʼani ndi kubalalitsa adani; ponyani mivi yanu ndi kuwathamangitsa.

7.verse: Tambasulani dzanja lanu kuchokera kumwamba; landitseni ndi kundipulumutsa, ku madzi amphamvu, mʼmanja mwa anthu achilendo,

8.verse: amene pakamwa pawo ndi podzala ndi mabodza, amene dzanja lawo lamanja ndi lachinyengo.

9.verse: Ndidzakuyimbirani nyimbo yatsopano Inu Mulungu; ndidzakuyimbirani nyimbo pa zeze wa nsambo khumi,

10.verse: kwa Iye amene amapambanitsa mafumu, amene amapulumutsa Davide mtumiki wake ku lupanga loopsa.

11.verse: Landitseni ndi kundipulumutsa, mʼmanja mwa anthu achilendo, amene pakamwa pawo ndi podzaza ndi mabodza, amene dzanja lawo lamanja ndi lachinyengo.

12.verse: Ndipo ana aamuna pa chinyamata chawo adzakhala ngati mbewu yosamalidwa bwino, ana athu aakazi adzakhala ngati zipilala zosemedwa bwino, zokongoletsera nyumba yaufumu.

13.verse: Nkhokwe zathu zidzakhala zodzaza ndi zokolola za mtundu uliwonse. Nkhosa zathu zidzaswana miyandamiyanda pa mabusa athu.

14.verse: Ngʼombe zathu zidzanyamula katundu wolemera. Sipadzakhala mingʼalu pa makoma, sipadzakhalanso kupita ku ukapolo, mʼmisewu mwathu simudzakhala kulira chifukwa cha mavuto.

15.verse: Odala anthu amene adzalandira madalitso awa; odala anthu amene Mulungu wawo ndi Yehova.

1.verse: Salimo la matamando la Davide. Ndidzakukwezani Mulungu wanga, Mfumu yanga; ndidzatamanda dzina lanu ku nthawi za nthawi.

2.verse: Ndidzakutamandani tsiku ndi tsiku ndi kulemekeza dzina lanu ku nthawi za nthawi.

3.verse: Yehova ndi wamkulu ndi woyenera matamando onse; ukulu wake palibe angawumvetsetse.

4.verse: Mʼbado wina udzayamikira ntchito yanu kwa mʼbado wina; Iwo adzafotokoza za machitidwe anu amphamvu.

5.verse: Adzayankhula ulemerero wokongola waufumu wanu, ndipo ine ndidzalingalira za ntchito zanu zodabwitsa.

6.verse: Iwo adzafotokoza za mphamvu ya ntchito zanu zoopsa kwambiri, ndipo ine ndidzalengeza za ntchito zanu zazikulu.

7.verse: Adzakondwerera kuchuluka kwa ubwino wanu, ndi kuyimba mwachimwemwe za chilungamo chanu.

8.verse: Yehova ndi wokoma mtima ndi wachifundo, wosakwiya msanga ndi wodzaza ndi chikondi chosasinthika.

9.verse: Yehova ndi wabwino kwa onse; amachitira chifundo zonse zimene anazipanga.

10.verse: Zonse zimene munazipanga zidzakutamandani, Inu Yehova; oyera mtima adzakulemekezani.

11.verse: Iwo adzafotokoza za ulemerero wa ufumu wanu ndi kuyankhula za mphamvu yanu,

12.verse: kuti anthu onse adziwe za machitidwe anu amphamvu ndi ulemerero wokongola wa ufumu wanu.

13.verse: Ufumu wanu ndi ufumu wamuyaya, ndipo ulamuliro wanu ndi wosatha pa mibado yonse. Yehova ndi wokhulupirika pa malonjezo ake onse ndi wokonda zonse zimene Iye anazipanga.

14.verse: Yehova amagwiriziza onse amene akugwa ndipo amakweza onse otsitsidwa.

15.verse: Maso a onse amayangʼana kwa Inu, ndipo Inu mumawapatsa chakudya chawo pa nthawi yoyenera.

16.verse: Mumatsekula dzanja lanu ndi kukwaniritsa zokhumba za chamoyo chilichonse.

17.verse: Yehova ndi wolungama mʼnjira zake zonse, ndi wokonda zonse zimene anazipanga.

18.verse: Yehova ali pafupi ndi onse amene amamuyitana, onse amene amamuyitana Iye mʼchoonadi.

19.verse: Iye amakwaniritsa zokhumba za iwo amene amamuopa; amamva kulira kwawo ndi kuwapulumutsa.

20.verse: Yehova amayangʼana onse amene amamukonda koma adzawononga anthu onse oyipa.

21.verse: Pakamwa panga padzayankhula zotamanda Yehova. Cholengedwa chilichonse chitamande dzina lake loyera ku nthawi za nthawi.

1.verse: Tamandani Yehova. Tamanda Yehova, iwe moyo wanga.

2.verse: Ndidzatamanda Yehova ndi moyo wanga wonse; ndidzayimba nyimbo zamatamando kwa Mulungu wanga nthawi yonse ya moyo wanga.

3.verse: Musamadalire mafumu, anthu osakhalitsa, amene sangathe kupulumutsa.

4.verse: Pamene mizimu yawo yachoka, iwo amabwerera ku dothi; zimene ankafuna kuchita zimatha tsiku lomwelo.

5.verse: Wodala ndi amene thandizo lake ndi Mulungu wa Yakobo.

6.verse: Wolenga kumwamba ndi dziko lapansi, nyanja ndi zonse zili mʼmenemo; Yehova, amene ndi wokhulupirika kwamuyaya.

7.verse: Iye amachitira chilungamo anthu oponderezedwa ndipo amapereka chakudya kwa anthu anjala. Yehova amamasula amʼndende,

8.verse: Yehova amatsekula maso anthu osaona, Yehova amadzutsa onse amene awerama pansi, Yehova amakonda anthu olungama.

9.verse: Yehova amasamalira alendo ndipo amathandiza ana ndi akazi amasiye, koma amasokoneza njira za anthu oyipa.

10.verse: Yehova ndiye Mfumu mpaka muyaya, Mulungu wako iwe Ziyoni, pa mibado yonse. Tamandani Yehova.

1.verse: Tamandani Yehova. Nʼkwabwino kwambiri kuyimba nyimbo zamatamando kwa Mulungu wathu, nʼkokondweretsa ndi koyenera kumutamanda!

2.verse: Yehova akumanga Yerusalemu; Iye akusonkhanitsa amʼndende a Israeli.

3.verse: Akutsogolera anthu osweka mtima ndi kumanga mabala awo.

4.verse: Amadziwa chiwerengero cha nyenyezi, ndipo iliyonse amayitchula dzina.

5.verse: Yehova ndi wamkulu ndi wamphamvu kwambiri; nzeru zake zilibe malire.

6.verse: Yehova amagwiriziza anthu odzichepetsa, koma amagwetsa pansi anthu oyipa.

7.verse: Imbirani Yehova ndi mayamiko; imbani nyimbo kwa Mulungu ndi pangwe.

8.verse: Iye amaphimba mlengalenga ndi mitambo; amapereka mvula ku dziko lapansi ndi kumeretsa udzu mʼmapiri.

9.verse: Iye amapereka chakudya kwa ngʼombe ndi kwa ana a makwangwala pamene akulira chakudya.

10.verse: Chikondwerero chake sichili mʼmphamvu za kavalo, kapena mʼmiyendo ya anthu amphamvu.

11.verse: Yehova amakondwera ndi amene amamuopa, amene chiyembekezo chawo chili mʼchikondi chake chosasinthika.

12.verse: Lemekeza Yehova, iwe Yerusalemu; tamanda Mulungu wako, iwe Ziyoni,

13.verse: pakuti Iye amalimbitsa mipiringidzo ya zipata zako ndi kudalitsa anthu ako mwa iwe.

14.verse: Iye amabweretsa mtendere mʼmalire mwako ndi kukukhutitsa ndi ufa wa tirigu wosalala.

15.verse: Iyeyo amapereka lamulo pa dziko lapansi; mawu ake amayenda mwaliwiro.

16.verse: Amagwetsa chisanu ngati ubweya ndi kumwaza chipale ngati phulusa.

17.verse: Amagwetsa matalala ngati miyala. Kodi ndani angathe kupirira kuzizira kwake?

18.verse: Amatumiza mawu ake ndipo chisanucho chimasungunuka; amawombetsa mphepo ndipo madzi amayenda.

19.verse: Iye anawulula mawu ake kwa Yakobo, malamulo ake ndi zophunzitsa zake kwa Israeli.

20.verse: Sanachitepo zimenezi kwa mtundu wina uliwonse wa anthu; anthu enawo sadziwa malamulo ake. Tamandani Yehova.

1.verse: Tamandani Yehova. Tamandani Yehova, inu a kumwamba, mutamandeni Iye, inu a mlengalenga.

2.verse: Mutamandeni, inu angelo ake onse, mutamandeni, mutamandeni, inu zolengedwa za mmwamba.

3.verse: Mutamandeni, inu dzuwa ndi mwezi, mutamandeni, inu nonse nyenyezi zowala.

4.verse: Mutamandeni, inu thambo la kumwambamwamba ndi inu madzi a pamwamba pa thambo.

5.verse: Zonse zitamande dzina la Yehova pakuti Iye analamula ndipo zinalengedwa.

6.verse: Iye anaziyika pa malo ake ku nthawi za nthawi; analamula ndipo sizidzatha.

7.verse: Tamandani Yehova pa dziko lapansi, inu zolengedwa zikuluzikulu za mʼnyanja, ndi nyanja zonse zakuya,

8.verse: inu zingʼaningʼani ndi matalala, chipale ndi mitambo, mphepo yamkuntho imene imakwaniritsa mawu ake,

9.verse: inu mapiri ndi zitunda zonse, inu mitengo ya zipatso ndi mikungudza yonse,

10.verse: inu nyama zakuthengo ndi ngʼombe zonse, inu zolengedwa zingʼonozingʼono ndi mbalame zowuluka.

11.verse: Inu mafumu a dziko lapansi ndi anthu a mitundu yonse, inu akalonga ndi olamulira a dziko lapansi.

12.verse: Inu anyamata ndi anamwali, inu nkhalamba ndi ana omwe.

13.verse: Onsewo atamande dzina la Yehova pakuti dzina lake lokha ndi lolemekezeka; ulemerero wake ndi woopsa pa dziko lapansi pano ndi kumwamba komwe.

14.verse: Iye wakwezera nyanga anthu ake, matamando a anthu ake onse oyera mtima, Aisraeli, anthu a pamtima pake. Tamandani Yehova.

1.verse: Tamandani Yehova. Imbirani Yehova nyimbo yatsopano, matamando ake mu msonkhano wa oyera mtima.

2.verse: Israeli asangalale mwa mlengi wake; anthu a ku Ziyoni akondwere mwa Mfumu yawo.

3.verse: Atamande dzina lake povina ndi kuyimbira Iye nyimbo ndi tambolini ndi pangwe.

4.verse: Pakuti Yehova amakondwera ndi anthu ake; Iye amaveka chipulumutso odzichepetsa.

5.verse: Oyera mtima asangalale mu ulemu wake ndi kuyimba mwachimwemwe pa mabedi awo.

6.verse: Matamando a Mulungu akhale pakamwa pawo, ndi lupanga lakuthwa konsekonse mʼmanja mwawo,

7.verse: kubwezera chilango anthu a mitundu ina, ndi kulanga anthu a mitundu yonse,

8.verse: kumanga mafumu awo ndi zingwe, anthu awo otchuka ndi unyolo wachitsulo,

9.verse: kuchita zimene zinalembedwa zotsutsana nawo Uwu ndi ulemerero wa oyera mtima ake onse. Tamandani Yehova.

1.verse: Tamandani Yehova. Tamandani Mulungu mʼmalo ake opatulika; mutamandeni ku thambo lake lamphamvu.

2.verse: Mutamandeni chifukwa cha machitidwe ake amphamvu; mutamandeni chifukwa cha ukulu wake wopambana.

3.verse: Mutamandeni poyimba malipenga, mutamandeni ndi pangwe ndi zeze.

4.verse: Mutamandeni ndi matambolini ndi kuvina, mutamandeni ndi zingwe ndi zitoliro.

5.verse: Mutamandeni ndi ziwaya zolira za malipenga, mutamandeni ndi ziwaya zolira kwambiri.

6.verse: Chamoyo chilichonse chopuma chitamande Yehova. Tamandani Yehova.
